Hernando is 25 years old, single and very hard-working.  He lives with his father, Heraclio, and his mother, Sabina, in his own home located in the San Juan de la Libertad rural area.  The life of this wonderful young man focuses on giving his loving parents constant support.  Eight years ago he began the hard job of a farmer on his 3 acres of land.  He raises potatoes, peas and lima beans with the help of his parents. He then sells his crop at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.

He also sells seeds when the time is right, traveling to the coast constantly.  Now he is sewing the seeds for the "canchan, única y Perricholi" variety of potato which he hopes will improve the quality of his products.

He is a member of the "Capital Semillera" (seed capital) communal bank and this is his third loan through MFP where he is one of the youngest members.  Hernando is preparing for the upcoming farm season and plans to use the loan to buy organic fertilizer, guano de isla (natural fertilizer) and top quality potato seeds to sew soon.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer, guano (natural fertilizer) and potato seeds

loans.name: Lesma Xiomara

texts.es:
La Sra. Lesma O. tiene un año de haber iniciado su negocio el cual es la venta de Ropa, calzado y cosméticos; negocio que opera bajo el nombre de variedades “CRISTELY” ubicado en la calle principal de la aldea de Jutiapa, Jamastran.
Sus clientes son los vecinos de la aldea de Jutiapa y de comunidades aledañas también vende a personas que transitan por dicha calle que conduce a las zonas montañosas y cafetaleras de la región. 
Lesma vive en unión libre y junto a su compañero de hogar han procreado dos hijos los cuales dependen de ellos, su marido para mejorar sus condiciones de vida esta trabajando en la ciudad capital Tegucigalpa y labora como policía nacional.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa para tener mas surtido su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lesma O. has been running her clothing, shoes and cosmetic shop for a year.   Her business is known as "CRISTELY" and located on the main street of the town of Jutiapa in Jamastran.

Her customers are the neighbors living in Jutiapa and the surrounding villages.  She also sells to people passing through on their way to the mountainous areas and coffee plantations.

Lesma has a common-law husband and two children.  In order to improve their living conditions, her husband works as a national policeman in the capital city of Tegucigalpa. 

She plans to use the loan to buy clothing to stock her business.

loans.use: To buy shirts, blouses, skirts, lingerie, jeans, t-shirts

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Akoélé Georgette

texts.fr: Mademoiselle   Georgette  a 31 ans.  Elle  est  née  à  Kovié   et  habite quartier  Wuiti.  Elle fait la vente du  riz et gari. En effet, elle   s’approvisionne  au marché de Kovié et d’Aflao  au Ghana  en gros et  revend  en détail.   Elle cumule 3 ans dans cette activité. Elle sollicite de  Wages  un prêt pour acheter  5  sacs du riz  et  4 sacs  de gari.
texts.en: Ms. Georgette, age 31, was in Kovié and lives in the Wuiti neighborhood in Lomé. She sells rice and tapioca. She buys her supplies wholesale at the market in Kovié and Aflao in Ghana, and resells retail. She's been running this business for three years, and is now seeking a loan from Kiva's partner, Wages, in order to buy 5 sacks of rice and 4 sacks of tapioca.

loans.use: To buy 5 sacks of rice and 4 sacks of tapioca

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: Blanca es una señora muy tediosa ya que a sus 42 años de edad  se dedica a vender comida como ambulante desde hace 7 años,  Blanca no solo se dedica a esta actividad sino también lava ropa ajena para tener un poco mas de ingresos y de esta manera ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y de sus cuatro hijos de los cuales 3 son aun menores de edad. Ella solicitó el préstamo para comprar los útiles escolares de sus hijos y también comprar algunos utensilios que le hace falta  para vender comida como: cucharas, tenedores y platos descartables. A blanca le gustaría tener un restaurante o una bodega.
texts.en:
Blanca is 42 years old and a very hard worker who has been a food peddlar for seven years.  She also has a clothes washing service to earn more income so she can help her husband with the household expenses and meet the needs of her four children, three of whom are still minors.

She plans to use the loan to buy school materials for her children and utensils for her food business, such as disposable spoons, forks and plates.  She would like to have her own restaurant or grocery store some day.

loans.use: To buy school materials and disposable utensils such as plates, spoons and forks

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito D. Juli, provincia D. Chucuito – Juli, departamento D. Puno, tiene 50 años D. edad.  Está casada y tienen 7 hijos, 5 D. ellos ya tienen familia.  Concepción solo pudo estudiar la primaria pero no la pudo terminar.
Con la participación D. su esposo se dedican a la producción D. la trucha, después D. cierto tiempo D. crecimiento y engorD., ella lleva a las ciudades D. Arequipa y Cusco para venderlos, no solo se dedica a la actividad mencionada sino también hace hermosos trabajos D. bordado.  Trabaja con el  Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace doce años, el primer préstamo fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles,  este dinero lo invirtió en la  compra y venta  D. golosinas.
Con éste préstamo D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, comprará  cuarenta kilos D. alimento, marca Naltech para la trucha.
 Su sueño es  salir adelante y exportar truchas para mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta D. su Banco Comunal es conversar en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Concepción is a member of the "María Asunción Galindo" communal bank which is located in the district of Juli in the province of chucuito - Juli, in the department of Puno.  She is 50 years old, married and has 7 children, 5 of whom have their own families.  Concepción began a primary education but was unable to finish it.  

She and her husband run a trout farm.  Once the fish are big enough she travels to the cities of Arequipo and Cusco to sell them.  She also sells the beautiful hand-maD. embroidery she makes.  She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movimiento for 12 years.  Her first loan in the amount of 300 PEN was used to buy and sell sweets.

She plans to use this new 300 PEN loan to buy 40 kilograms of Naltech brand trout feed.  Her dream is to get ahead and start to export trout to improve income.  Se enjoys the conversations that take place during the meetings at the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy 40 kilograms of Naltech brand trout feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw materials to make hammocks and ingredients for fast food

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr: Monsieur  Komlan  est marié  avec  4 enfants  en charge.  Il a 34 ans et  habite  quartier  Adamavo. Il fait le commerce des pièces détachées. Il   achète en gros  et revend   en détail  à côté de  la  station d’essence  Shell à Akodessewa.  IL  a employé  une  personne qui l’aide dans ces activités. Il demande un prêt  pour se réapprovisionner.
texts.en:
Mr. Komlan is married with four children to support. He is 34 years old and lives in the Adamavo neighborhood. 

He earns a living selling spare parts. He buys them wholesale and sells them at retail next to the Shell gas station in Akodessewa. He has one employee to help him in his activities. 

He is seeking a loan to replenish his stock.

loans.use: Purchase of spare parts for resale

loans.name: Betty Edme

texts.es: LA Sra. Betty se dedica a la Venta de Pan en la Calle Cutervo desde hace tres años tiene una Hija es madre soltera tiene casa propia la cual esta pagando el papà su hija le pasa una mensualidad desea el crédito para la cancelación de su terreno y para realizar algunos areglos en su casa es una mujer luchadora que ha salido adelante con su hija sola y tiene amplios deseos de superación y aspiraciones.
texts.en: Betty has been selling bread on Cutervo Street for three years.  She is a single mother of one daughter.  She has her own house which the father of her daughter is paying her a monthly payment.  Betty wants a loan to pay off her land and to arrange some things in her home.  She is a fighter who has come forward with her daughter alone, and she has a broad desire to excel toward her aspirations.

loans.use: To finish paying for her land.

loans.name: Rodolfo Antonio

texts.es: Rodolfo Antonio tiene 28 años, esta no es la primera experiencia que tiene con financiamientos pues ha sido de gran ayuda trabajar con Fundación. Su actividad económica es la venta plátanos. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica a este negocio. Por lo que tiene 3 hijos a su cargo, su negocio tiene mucho tiempo de permanecer en la familia, es así que ha luchado por mantener esta actividad. Actualmente solicita este financiamiento es para la compra de mas plátanos. El deseo de Rodolfo es mejorar sus ingresos para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rodolfo Antonio is 28 years old and this is not his first experience receiving financial support from the Foundation which has been of great help.  

He has been selling bananas for 10 years.  He has three children under his care and this business allows him to spend a lot of time with the family, so he has fought hard to keep this job.

He plans to use the loan to buy more bananas.  Rodolfo's dream is to improve his earnings and give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Dame  Ama  a 2  enfants  et est mariée.  Elle est âgée de 38 ans.   Pour contribuer au menage,  elle fait  le commerce de maïs.  Elle s'approvisionne à  Assrama et Tsanwé et revient vendre  au marché de Hédzranawoé. Elle compte dans cette activité 10 ans.  Elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 20 nouveaux sacs de maïs.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ama is married with two children. She is 38 years old. She sells maize to help with the household responsibilities. She gets her stocks in Assrama and in Tsanwé, then returns to sell the maize at the Hédzranawoé market. She has 10 years of experience in this activity. 

She is seeking a loan to buy 20 bags of maize.

loans.use: Purchase of maize

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito D. Juli, provincia D. Chucuito – Juli, departamento D. Puno, tiene 55 años D. edad, está casada y tiene con cuatro hijos.  Alejandrina no pudo concluir sus estudios D. primaria. 
Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace doce años, su primer crédito fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para comprar zanahoria  y lechuga para incrementar la mercadería D. su negocio, tiene un puesto en el mercado central D. juli donD. ofrece toda clase D. verduras, su esposo se encuentra en el campo dedicándose a la agricultura.
Con éste préstamo D. S/ 600.00 nuevo soles, comprará 4 arrobas D. zanahoria, 6 D. cebolla y 2 cajas D. tomate, dichos productos son comprados en las afueras D. la ciudad.
Su sueño es continuar con la misma actividad y mejorar sus ganancias.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es el trabajo en equipo.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the "María Asunción Galindo" communal bank which is located in the districto of Juli, province of Chucuito-Juli, in the department of Puno.  She is 55 years old, married and has four children.  Alejandrina was unable to finish her primary education.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 12 years.  Her first loan in the amount of 300 PEN was used to buy carrots and lettuce for her central market stall in Juli where she sells all kinds of vegetables.  Her husband is a farmer.

She plans to use the new 600 PEN loan to buy carrots, onions and tomatoes which she must purchase outsiD. the city.

Her dream is to continue her business and improve her earnings.  She enjoys the teamwork present at the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy carrots, onions and tomatoes

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Idalia Del Carmen es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora de 49 años de edad. Trabaja de una manera independiente pues su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general, inició su negocio por esfuerzos propios con la venta de ropa más tarde es que decide recurrir a las casa comerciales para la venta de cosméticos,  al ver que tenia ciertos clientes decide mantener este negocio, ya que tiene la obligación de mantener a sus 3 hijos y solamente 1 está a su cargo. Es por eso que realiza este financiamiento para la compra de materia prima. Por lo que sueña con mejorar seguirle brindando a su familia el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
Idalia Del Carmen is a hard-working entrepreneur who is 49 years old.  She has a business selling general goods which she set up on her own initiative by selling clothing.  Later she decided to sell cosmetics and kept up the business in order to maintain her three children, one of whom still lives with her.  

She plans to use the loan to buy raw materials.  Her goal is to continue providing an income and putting food on the table for her family.

loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia de Chucuito – Juli, departamento de Puno, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres  hijos.  Rosa no pudo estudiar, es analfabeta. 
Desde hace doce años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizó en la compra de lana para realizar bordados.

Actualmente se dedica a la crianza de truchas, hoy en día tiene seis jaulas donde contiene 30 mil unidades de trucha, cada seis a siete meses están listas para poder venderlas y lo realiza en su comunidad debido a que tiene clientes fijos que vienen desde desaguadero.  En esta actividad participa toda la familia.
Con éste nuevo crédito de S/ 1500.00 nuevo soles, podrá comprar unos seis  a siete  sacos de comida de trucha. 
Su sueño es incrementar más truchas y jaulas, para mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "María Asunción Galindo" communal bank located in the district of Juli, province of Chucuito-Juli, in the department of Puno.  She is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Rosa was unable to go to school and is illiterate.

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 12 years.  She used her first loan in the amount of 300 PEN to buy thread for her embroidery work.

Now she has a trout farm with six cages and some 30,000 trout.  Every six or seven months they are ready to be sold.  She has a fixed customer base in the community.  The entire family works in this business.

With the new loan in the amount of 1500 PEN, she plans to buy seven sacks of trout feed.  Her dream is to expand production with more cages and trout in order to improve income.  She likes the punctuality of the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy seven sacks of trout feed

loans.name: Fany

texts.es:
Fany es una madre de familia de 38 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el caserío Las Monicas del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, ella cría gallinas, patos, pavos en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside y el mercado de la zona.

Fany desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus aves ya que la demanda ha aumentado.  Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Fany is 38 years old and lives with her husband and three children in the neighborhood of Las Monicas in the farm district of Tambogrande.  This is an agricultural area in the Piura region which is over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

In an area behind her house, she raises hens, ducks and turkeys, which she then sells to visiting merchants or at the local market.

Fany wants to buy balanced feed for her poultry since demand has increased.  Through Edpyme alternativa she has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 PEN.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed

loans.name: Pedro Jesus

texts.es: Solicitante, tiene 51 años, es casado, tiene inmueble propio, es maestro constructor hace varios años,  tiene la meta de tener todas sus herramienta y asi realizar mas trabajaos, y cumplir con sus sueños y objetivos, solicita credito para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: The borrower is 51 years old, married, owns his house and has been a master builder for several years.  His goal is to have all the tools to do more jobs reach all his goals and dreams.  He is asking for a home improvement loan.

loans.use: For home improvement.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es: Hugo, de 28 años es un hombre responsable y trabajador. En armonía familiar convive con Eraida y su hijo Johan, en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de San Juan de la libertad. El trabajo al que se dedica desde hace 6 años es la siembra de diferentes productos oriundos del lugar como: papa y arveja. Los que gracias al apoyo de su madre, quien le apoya en los cuidados que brinda, los puede comercializar en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es el tiempo que le dedica al cuidado de sus cultivos. Ahora él tiene sembrado papa de las variedades “única y perricholi”, que sembrará dentro de estos meses. Él pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde espera logar sus objetivos con el apoyo de su asociación. Hugo, comenzará a sembrar arveja, por ello con el crédito esta pensando comprar 6 bolsas de semillas y varios sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Hugo is 28 years old and is a hard-working responsible man.  He has a harmonious family life together with Eraida and his son Johan in the house he owns in the San Juan de la Libertad rural area.  For six years he has been growing different native crops such as potatoes and peas.  With his mother's help he cares for his crop which he later sells at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.

What he likes most about his work is the time spent caring for the crops.  Now he plans to grow the potato varieties "unica" and "perricholi", and will sew the seeds soon.  He belongs to the "capital semillera" (seed capital) communal bank and this is his first loan through MFP.  With the support of this association he hopes to be able to meet his goals.

Hugo will begin sewing peas soon and plans to use the loan to buy six bags of seed and several sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy six bags of pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: This is 34 year-old Fatmata K.. She is married and has two children aged two and six. In 2008, Fatmata K. established a kitchen utensil business. She opens her business six days a week and eleven hours a day. She is requesting a loan of 4,800,000 SLL to help her buy a large quantity of stock. This will reduce her transportation costs and in turn increase her profit margin. In the future, Fatmata plans to buy a piece of land. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more plastic kitchen equipment

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ursula Aydee

texts.es: URSULA tiene 35 años vive en casa propia con su cònyuge y tiene 3 hijos su cònyuge es profesor de arte tambien ejerce  sus trabajaos independientes de dibujos y otros, a la fecha esta preparandose para  dar un examen de nombramiento para su especialidad, su cònyuge tiene una tienda en su propia casa ,tienen experiencia crediticia y buenas referencias personales , solicita dicho credito para gastos personales se propone por contar con capacidad y sobre todo voluntad de pago.
texts.en: Ursula is 35 years old and lives in her own house with her spouse and their 3 children.  She is also an art professor.  She does independent drawings and other works.  To date, she is preparing for a consideration for appointment in a post in her specialty.  Her spouse has a shop at home.  They have good credit history and personal references.  She is requesting the loan for personal expenses, and expresses her proposed capacity and overall a willingness to pay it back.

loans.use: For personal expenses

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Jenny Elizabeth, ella tiene 45 años, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad. La señora Jenny se dedica a la venta de cosméticos los cuales distribuye generalmente de forma ambulante, también en su casa realiza ventas, las cuales en su mayoría son a crédito. Ella dio inicio a este negocio porque no tena un medio de supervivencia y al mismo tiempo no encontraba trabajo. Este negocio le ha servido como fuente de ingresos para ella y para la manutención de su familia. Esta solicitando un financiamiento que será invertido en la compra de lápiz labial, cremas, pinturas, brillos entre otros. Ella posee el sueño de hacer que el negocio crezca lo suficiente para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda realizar mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mrs. Jenny Elizabeth is 45 years old and has one minor child.  She has a business selling cosmetics which she either distributes herself or sells out of her home, mostly on a credit basis.  She began this activity because she had no other income and couldn't find a job.

This business has been a source of income for her and the family.  She plans to use the loan to buy lipstick, creams, make-up and eye-shadow.  Her dream is to grow her business enough in the near future to be able to make home improvements.

loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy uniforms

loans.name: Abu B

texts.en: Abu L. is 50 years old. He has three children aged 2, 7 and 14 years old. Abu started his art and craft business in 2005. He has six trainees who also have a similar talent. Abu opens his business at 7a.m. and closes at 7.30p.m. daily. He has a very good loan repayment history. Abu is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 SLL to buy more materials such as paints, poplin etc. In the future Abu plans to acquire a bigger compound. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more art and craft materials

loans.name: María Ermitania

texts.es:
María es una madre de familia de 55 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a su  hijo en el distrito la Matanza ubicado en la Provincia de Morrropon que pertenece a la región Piura, que se ubica a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo capital de la Región de la Lambayeque.

María trabaja como empleada en la Municipalidad de su distrito desde hace tres años, donde posee buenas referencias personales y laborales. Gracias a esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo para solventar los gastos económicos de su familia. 

María desea realizar algunas mejoras en su vivienda de modo que su familia pueda vivir en mejores condiciones. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old and lives with her husband and son in the district of Matanza located in the province of Morropon, which belongs to the Piura region.  This is about four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

María has worked as an employee of the city for three years and has good personal and work references.  Thanks to this activity she is able to help her husband take care of family household expenses.

María wants to make some home improvements so her family can enjoy better living conditions.  For the first time she has requested a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: For home improvement

loans.name: Isha S.

texts.en: This is 41-year-old Isha. She is single, has one child and one additional dependent, whom she adopted. In 2003, Isha established her used items business, selling items such as foam mattresses, bicycles and chairs. She began this business with the hope of getting enough money to support her family. She opens her business six days a week and eleven hours a day. She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 SLL in order to make advance payment for an expected shipment from the USA. In the future, Isha plans to make fixed deposit savings for her children.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To make advance payment for shipment of her goods

loans.name: Idalídes Isabel

texts.es:
Idalides V.  vive en el Líbano un barrio de Cartagena, donde tiene un negocio de variedades  y vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños,  calcetines, y en general accesorios femeninos. Este es su segundo financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y su primer credikiva, con el cual comprará una vitrina, ropa femenina e infantil, y cosméticos que tiene encargados por sus clientes.  Su negocio inició hace tres años cuando a través de una revista especializada de productos empezó a vender mercancías específicas,  para  apoyar la gestión de su hogar, adquirir independencia financiera,  y como le llamó la atención  los premios o promociones comerciales que entrega la revista por su compra, se entusiasmó y se afilió de inmediato.  
Actualmente  ha logrado gran diversificación en su oferta y ya no solo está vinculada con un catalogo, sino que maneja  cuatro,  para lograr integrar a su variedad  todos los productos que requieren sus clientes, con el fin de que al llegar a su negocio, compren y logren su satisfacción. 
A Idalides le va muy bien, porque es muy conocida en su zona de trabajo y además cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo,  quien le consigue también, buenos clientes entre sus vecinos y amigos.  Su mayor desafío es aumentar su capital de trabajo, para vender de manera sostenida y obtener utilidades importantes que le permitan cubrir los gastos de educación universitaria de sus hijos,  en las edades de 14 y 17 años, uno de los cuales está próximo a comenzar estos estudios.
Idalides V. aprovecha muy bien la ubicación que tiene en su barrio donde se encuentran muy cerca a escenarios deportivos y un importante numero de negocios que interactúan y forman parte de sus clientes reales y potenciales y que cada día busca fidelizar.
texts.en:
Idalides V. lives in Líbano, an area in Cartagena, where she has a business selling clothing for women, men and children, socks and women's accessories.  This is her second loan through the Mario Santo Domingo foundation and first through Kiva.  She plans to use the loan to buy a display case, women's and children's clothing and cosmetics which have been ordered by customers.  

She began her activity three years ago through a specialized magazine and began selling specific goods to help with household expenses and have financial independence.  She was so enthusiastic about the rewards and sales promotions she could receive through the magazine that she signed up right away.

She has been able to add more variety to her range of products and not only sells through one catalogue but through four.  This is so she can offer her customers everything they need to their full satisfaction.

Idalides is very successful because she is well-known in the area and has a lot of support from her husband who also helps her reach more customers in the neighborhood and among friends.  Her greatest challenge is to increase working capital so she can maintain sales and obtain earnings that allow her to cover university expenses for her children who range in age from 14 to 17.  One is about to begin college.

Idalides V. takes full advantage of her location in the neighborhood since she is very near sports venues and many businesses there work together to keep a loyal customer base.

loans.use: To buy a display case, women's and children's clothing and cosmetics

loans.name: Julio C.tello Al Progreso Group

texts.es: “Julio c. Tello al Progreso” es una D. nuestras Alcancías Comunales más antiguas, son unidos y muy responsables. Anabel es una nueva socia ella participa en esta Alcancía Comunal hace 4 meses, tiene 27 años D. edad  es conviviente  y tiene una niña D. tres años D. edad, es  muy trabajadora, ella se desempeña como moto taxista. Empezó esta actividad porque le hacía falta un chofer y los choferes que contrataba le resultaban mal y  esto le generaba bajos ingresos motivo por el cual Anabel deciD. trabajar como chofer D. su propia moto taxi juntamente con su esposo  quien se encarga D. la otra moto taxi que tienen. Anabel ayuda a su esposo con los gastos D. la casa y D. su niña, con los ingresos D. su trabajo compró una refrigeradora. Ella solicitó el préstamo para pagar los gastos D. reparación D. la moto que conduce su esposo.  Anabel dice le gustaría comprarse un puesto en algún mercado para  vender ropa para niños y adultos. En la fotografía podemos apreciar a  8 socias D. esta “Alcancía Comunal “y una D. ellas acompañada D. su niña. La señora Carmen Maritza V. M.  no pudo asistir al desembolso por motivos D. trabajo.
texts.en: “Julio c. Tello al Progreso” is one of our oldest communal banks and the members are unified and very responsible. Anabel is a new member, having started out at the communal bank 4 months ago.  She is 27 years old, married common-law, and she has a three year old daughter. She is very hard working and she provides public transport with her rickshaw. She started this business because she needed a driver and the drivers that she used to hire never worked out, resulting in lower revenues. This is the reason why Anabel started out as the driver of her own rickshaw taxi service. Her husband is in charge of the other rickshaw that they have. Anabel contributes with her husband towards the household expenses and those of their daughter. With the help of her income she purchased a refrigerator. She requests a loan to pay for the repair of the motorcycle that is used by her husband. Anabel says that she would like to set up a stand in a market to sell clothing for children and adults. In the photograph we can see the 8 members of this communal bank and one of the members is seen with her daughter. Mrs. Carmen Maritza V. M. is not seen in the picture because she had to be at work

loans.use: To repair her motorcycle rickshaw.

loans.name: Alhaji A.

texts.en: Alhaji F. is 38 years old and has two dependents. Alhaji has a ready-made clothes and shoes business in the central business district of Freetown city. He is determined to ensure that his business is successful because it is the only source of income for his family. He opens his business six days a week for eleven hours a day. He has a very good loan repayment history. Alhaji needs a loan of 4,500,000 SLL to help him buy different fashions of jeans-shirts and leather shoes from neighboring Guinea. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more clothing

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Fatmata C..  She is married and has two children, ages 10 and 15. She has two additional dependents whom she adopted.  

In 2008, Fatmata established her food business. She began her business because it is fast-moving and she has great help from her husband.  She opens her business seven days a week and eight hours a day. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 4,000,000 SLL.  Fatmata needs the loan in order to purchase a large quantity of palm oil, bags of rice and other food items. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy food items

loans.name: Fudia

texts.en: Fudia is 40 years old.  She is single, and has one 14-year-old child and one additional dependent. In 2008, Fudia established her bar and restaurant business. She began her business because she saw that there are lots of offices situated in that particular area and workers were finding it difficult to get food.  She opens her business 6 days a week and 12 hours a day. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL in order to purchase more drinks and food items to meet the demands of the customers during the 50th year Independent Anniversary celebration. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more drinks and food items

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es: Maria Erlinda tiene 35 años, su actividad económica es una pulpería. Actualmente tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. Ella realiza esta actividad hace 10 años, cuando empezó fue por su esposo, ya que anteriormente el trabajaba en una empresa y con el dinero logro comprar ciertos productos, fue así que poco a poco lograron incrementar su inventario y tienen una gran clientela. Ella solicita el financiamiento para capital de trabajo comprara golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, pan, refrescos entre otros. Maria desea que todos los esfuerzos ha realizado ayuden a sus hijos para que obtenga una educación digna.
texts.en: Maria Erlinda is 35 years old and she has a convenience store business. She has 2 children in her care. She has had this business for 10 years and she started out thanks to her husband. He was previously employed at a company and with savings he managed to purchase some products. This is how they slowly started to increase their inventory and to earn a large clientele. She requests a loan to use as working capital and to purchase sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, breads, and other products. Maria wants to see all of her efforts support her children and to have a good education.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Gabriel De Jesús

texts.es:
Desplazado por la situación de violencia por la que atravesaba Urrao Antioquia, su municipio de origen, Gabriel de Jesús U. Z. y su esposa no vieron otra opción que desplazarse a la ciudad de Medellín para buscar mejores oportunidades. 

Las manos de Gabriel y el poco dinero con que contaba fueron los insumos para emprender su propio negocio. Este luchador incansable inició vendiendo frutas y pescado por diferentes calles de la ciudad, con la esperanza de salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Desde hace 4 años Gabriel logró tener su punto fijo de venta de frutas, ubicado en el centro de la ciudad, allí trabaja desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 7:00 p.m. para obtener su sustento diario. 

Crecer su negocio y lograr ofrecer mayor variedad de frutas a sus clientes es el sueño de este emprendedor, que necesita de un préstamo para pagar algunas deudas las frutas que ha comprado y comprar más productos para incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
The violence that was occurring in Urrao Antioquia, his municipality of origin, Gabriel de Jesus U. Z. and his wife saw no other option than to move to the city of Medellin, in search of better opportunities. 

With his hands and with the small savings he had were the only tools he had to start his own business. He is a fighter that never tires and he started out selling fruits and fish along various streets in the city. His hope was to pull through and to improve their quality of life. 

Four years ago Gabriel managed to have a fixed location from where to sell fruits and it is located in the downtown area of the city. He works from 7am to 7pm to earn a daily living. 

The dream of this enterprising man is to make his business grow and to offer a larger variety of fruits to his clients.  He requires a loan to cancel some loans he incurred in the purchase of fruits in the past and to purchase more products to increase his sales.

loans.use: To purchase fruits.

loans.name: Beatriz Eugenia

texts.es:
Para salir adelante con sus hijas y superar la separación de su esposo, Beatriz Eugenia M. D. encontró en su negocio una oportunidad para convertirse en madre cabeza de hogar y superar las dificultades. 

Desde hace 3 años esta emprendedora con sus pocos ahorros y algunos préstamos le dio vida a su negocio de venta de ropa donde además presta servicios de bordado. Es así como Beatriz lucha día a día para sacar a sus dos hijas adelante. 

Actualmente Beatriz necesita de un crédito para comprar mercancía y abastecerse de algunas prendas que le hacen falta para ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
In order to support her daughters and to survive the separation from her husband, Beatriz Eugenia M. D. found an opportunity in her business that would let her become the head of the household and to overcome their difficulties. 

Three years ago this enterprising woman started her clothing and embroidery business with the few savings she had and some personal loans. This is how Beatriz works day after day to support her two daughters. 

Beatriz requests a loan to purchase merchandise and to supply her with some articles of clothing that she needs to increase the variety of goods to offer her clients.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Beker Francisco

texts.es: Beker Francisco es padre de familia, tiene cinco hijos, el señor realiza una actividad comercial de una pulpería, tiene10 años de trabajar en este negocio, gracias a su esfuerzo a podido salir adelante el y su familia, por lo que busca la manera de cómo ganarse la vida y mantener a su familia de una manera decente. El está muy contento con este negocio que es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que siempre se preocupa por mejorar cada en el servicio de su negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para comprar golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, gaseosas entre otros. Su deseo es seguir adelante con este negocio.
texts.en: Beker Francisco is a father of 5 children and he has a convenience store business. He has 10 years in the business and it is thanks to his efforts that he has been able to support his family. He is always in search of ways to earn a living and to support her family in a decent way. He is very happy with his business. It is the primary source of income so he always wanting to improve his service. The loan that he requests will be used to purchase sweets, soft drinks, breads, cookies, and other products. His wish is to keep up with this business.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Yeison Alexis

texts.es:
Llegar a tener una gran empresa es el sueño de Yeison Alexis Díaz P., un joven emprendedor que al lado de su familia aprendió el oficio de la Confección el cual debido a la falta de oportunidades lo convirtió en su fuente de ingresos. 

A sus 26 años, Yeison confecciona diferentes tipos de prenda por encargos y a pesar de que en algunas ocasiones sus clientes se retrazan en los pagos, es así como este joven se gana la vida. 

Yeison necesita de un préstamo para comprar algunas herramientas para sus máquinas y adquirir algunos insumos, esto se convertirá en una oportunidad para mejorar sus procesos, hacer más rápido la producción y generar un incremento en sus ventas debido a la capacidad de respuesta para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Coming to have a large business is Yeison Alexis D. Perez's dream. He is a young enterprising man who learned the business of tailoring from his family. Due to the lack of employment opportunities this business became his source of income. 

At 26 years of age, Yeison makes various types of clothing as special orders are placed. And even though sometimes his clients fall behind on their payments he is still able to earn a living. 

Yeison requires a loan to purchase certain tools for his machines and to purchase some materials. This will translate into an opportunity to improve his work, increasing the production rate and generate an increased level of sales given the improved ability to respond to his clients.

loans.use: To purchase materials and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es:
Tal y como lo describe Miriam del Socorro R. C. su trabajo inicia desde que se levanta y termina cuando se acuesta y es esta su forma de vida, pues desde pequeña esta luchadora incansable ha trabajado en diferentes oficios para ganarse la vida. Lavar ropa, trabajar en una mina, vender arepas, cremas y otros productos han sido algunos de los trabajos que ha desempeñado para salir adelante. 

Actualmente Miriam vende gas a los vecinos de la vereda del municipio de San Roque de donde es oriunda y para mejorar su servicio necesita de un préstamo para mejorar el piso del local ya que es en arena, así mismo espera comprar más gas para tener mayor capacidad de respuesta para sus clientes.
texts.en:
As Miriam del Socorro R. Castano describes it, her way of life is to work from the moment she  wakes in the morning until she goes back to sleep. Since she was a young girl this tireless fighter has had a several businesses to earn a living, including, providing laundry services, working in a mine, selling Venezuelan corn cakes and creams and other products. These have been some of the occupations she has had to make a living. 

Miriam sells propane gas to her neighbors in the municipality of San Roque, her place of origin.  In order to improve her service she needs a loan. She will improve the flooring of her store, currently it is only sand. She also wants to purchase more propane gas to have larger quantities in store for her clients.

loans.use: To improve her business.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia de Chucuito – Juli, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  Ella estudió la secundaria completa. 
Patricia se dedica es la crianza de trucha, viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace doce años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, con ese dinero compró comida para trucha.
Tiene cuatro jaulas donde cría 2500 unidades, cada seis  a  siete meses realiza su respectiva venta todo en su comunidad, ya que los clientes vienen desde desaguadero y lo vende al por mayor.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, comprará dos sacos de alimentos balanceados para la trucha (purina y tomasino), además comprará insumos para elaborar  comida para la trucha; los insumos que emplean para elaborar son: la soya, harina de pescado, aceite de germen de trigo, entre otros, lo cual es un poco económico para los productores. 
Su sueño es seguir con la misma actividad por unos cuantos años y posteriormente cambiar a otra actividad debido a la elevación del precio de los alimentos balanceados. Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es el interés generado por los ahorros.
texts.en:
Patricia is a member of the communal bank named "Maria Asuncion Galindo", located in the district of Juli, in the province of Chucuito-Juli, in the department of Puno. She is 42 years old, married, and she has four children. She graduated high school. 

Patricia has a trout hatchery. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for twelve years. Her first loan was in the amount of S/300 nuevos soles and she purchased feed for trout. 

She has four basins where she has 2500 units and every six to seven months she sells the entire stock to the community. Her clients come all the way from Desaguadero and she sells in wholesale. 

With this loan, amounting to S/1000 nuevos soles, she will purchase two sacks of balanced feed for trout (Purina and Tomasino brands). She will also purchase ingredients to prepare foods for trout. The ingredients she uses are soy, fish flour, wheat germ, and others. This is more economical for producers. 

Her dream is to keep up with the same business and in a few years to change to a different business type. The price of balanced feed is rising. What she most enjoys about her communal bank is the interest generated by her savings.

loans.use: To purchase balanced feed for trout.

loans.name: Nolberta

texts.es:
Nolberta es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia de Chucuito – Juli, departamento de Puno, tiene 50 años de edad, es  conviviente y tiene tres  hijos.  No tiene estudios. 
Se dedica a la producción de trucha, actividad que realiza junto a su esposo. Está trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres años, su primer crédito fue de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizó en la compra de alimentos balanceados para la trucha, la trucha es vendido en la comunidad donde radica, debido a que los clientes vienen desde desaguadero a comprar y los productores lo único que hacen es entregar por kilo.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 1500.00 nuevo soles, podrá comprar seis sacos de alimento, es decir 240 kilos de marca purina para alimentar a las truchas que se encuentran en dos jaulas.
Su sueño es incrementar más jaulas de trucha. Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es la capacitación realizada por la oficial d crédito y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Nolberta is a member of the communal bank named "Maria Asuncion Galindo", located in the district of Juli, the province of Chucuito-Juli, in the department of Puno. She is 50 years old, married common-law, and she has three children. She did not go to school.

She has a trout hatchery and she runs the business together with her husband. She has been with the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for the past three years. Her first loan was in the amount of S/500 nuevos soles and she used the loan to purchase balanced trout feed. The trout is sold in the community where she lives. Her clients come from Desaguadero to buy and producers sell by the kilo. 

With this loan, amounting to S/1500 nuevos soles, she will purchase six sacks of feed that is 240 kg of Purina brand feed, to feed the trout that live in two basins. Her dream is to have more basins for trout. She most enjoys her communal bank for the training provided by the loan officials and the savings program.

loans.use: To purchase trout feed.

loans.name: Reinaldo De Jesús

texts.es:
Superación, innovación y compromiso son las palabras que describen a Reinaldo de Jesús P. M., quien después de quedarse desempleado, vio en la venta de comestibles una oportunidad para superar la dificultad económica por la que atravesaba. 

Con la ayuda de sus esposa y con la esperanza de salir adelante y superar las dificultades, Reinaldo inició su negocio que poco a poco ha ido mejorando gracias a su gran esfuerzo. 

En su carrito de comidas, Reinaldo vende papitas fritas, platanitos, papas criollas, entre otros productos apetecidos por sus clientes. Su trabajo se extiende hasta las 10:00 ó 12:00 de la noche puesto que tal y como lo afirma es a esas horas cuando se incrementan las ventas. 

Actualmente, Reinaldo necesita de un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones en su carrito de ventas con el fin de ofrecer sus productos frescos y calientes sin tener que volver a reprocesarlos.
texts.en:
Self-improvement, innovation, and commitment are the words that describe Reinaldo de Jesús P. M. who, after becoming unemployed, saw the business of food sales as an opportunity to overcome the financial difficulty he had been going through.  

Hoping to get ahead and overcome financial difficulties, Reinaldo started this business with his wife’s help.  The business has been gradually improving thanks to his hard work.  

At his food cart, Reinaldo sells French fries, bananas, “papas criollas” (small yellow potatoes), and other products his customers crave.  He works until 10:00 or 12:00 at night because, as he says, this is when sales increase.

Currently, Reinaldo needs a loan to make some adaptations to his food cart so that he can offer his products fresh and hot without having to reprocess them.

loans.use: To up-grade food cart.

loans.name: Johana Isabel

texts.es:
Johanna casada,  tiene a su niña en la primaria, mujer emprendedora tiene su propio negocio en el cual vende cosméticos y variedades.  Como planes mejora su nivel de vida, inicio al ver que requería de una entrada de dinero extra y con fondos propios.
Agradece a la financiera por su apoyo ya que con el préstamo que solicitad será invertido en la compra de cremas, perfumes, pintura de labios, cejas, rostro entre otro productos. Aumentado sus inventarío y así sus ganancia.
texts.en:
Johanna is married and has a daughter in elementary school.  She’s an enterprising woman with her own cosmetics and notions business.  In order to improve her life she started with her own funds when she saw that she needed an extra source of income.

She is grateful to the financial institution for the support the loan she’s asking for will be.  It will be used to buy creams, perfumes, lipsticks, eyebrow pencils, rouge, among other products, to increase her inventory and thus her profits.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria Del Carmen, tiene 35 años y se dedica a la comercialización de mercadería en general. El negocio Maria lo inició hace 10 años, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Con el paso del tiempo fue ampliando su inventario y agregó otras mercancías, como calcetines, conjuntos de niños y ropa interior para damas, caballeros e infantil, pero eso si siempre ha sido apoyada por su esposo en sus proyectos de vida y esto la inspira a seguir adelante. Con este crédito, comprará calzado, cosméticos, ropa en general, sabanas. Sueña avanzar en su crecimiento empresarial.
texts.en:
Maria Del Carmen, age 35, sells general merchandise.  Maria started her business ten years ago.  She has two minor children under her care.

As time passed, she was increasing her inventory.  She added other merchandise like socks, children’s outfits, and underwear for women, men, and children.  She has always been supported by her husband in all her projects in life, and this inspires her to keep going.

She will use this loan to buy footwear, cosmetics, general clothing, and sheets.  She dreams of advancing in the growth of her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Bolivar

texts.es:
Bolívar casado, hombre trabajador, su casa es humilde, tiene como proyecto la terminación de la construcción total de su casa, ha ido poco a poco realizando mejoras en la vivienda.
Con este ciclo de préstamo comprar materiales de construcción: cemento, arena, piedra, bloque, alambre de amarre, camisa, entre otros materiales. Para la construcción de un cuarto.
texts.en: Bolívar is a hard-working married man.  He lives in a modest home.  His current project is to complete construction of his home.  He has been making improvements to it little by little.  With the loan proceeds, he will buy construction materials: cement, sand, stone, blocks and wire, among other items.  This is for the construction of a room.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials.

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.es:
La señora Tatiana G. es una fémina trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora originaria de San Juan de Oriente conocido por sus artesanías. Ella es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace 5 años en la que invertirá el crédito en la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, pollo, pan, café, gaseosas y crema con el fin de aumentar el negocio. 
G. está casada y su esposo es artesano el cual vende sus productos en Bluefields.
texts.en: Tatiana G. is a hard-working, driven and enterprising woman.  She is from San Juan de Oriente which is known for its handicrafts.  Tatiana is the owner of a small grocery store.  She has owned her business for 5 years and she will invest her loan money in buying rice, sugar, oil, chicken, bread, coffee, soda and cream with the aim of increasing her business.  Tatiana is married and her husband is a craftsman who sells his products in Bluefields.

loans.use: To buy basic grains

loans.name: Rafael De Jesús

texts.es:
Desde pequeño, Rafael de Jesús M. C. aprendió el oficio de la Carpintería y después de trabajar durante algunos años decidió independizarse para montar su propio negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, pues aunque vive solo espera llegar a una vejez bien vivida. 

Actualmente Rafael necesita de un préstamo para comprar algunas máquinas que le permitirán mejorar su producción y así captar cada vez más clientes, pues además de sus manos que son lo que le han generado el trabajo desea ampliar su maquinaria para ampliar cada vez más su negocio.
texts.en:
Rafael de Jesús M. C. learned the carpentry trade when he was a young boy.  After having worked for some years, he decided to work for himself, set up his own business and improve his quality of life as, although he lives on his own, he hopes to enjoy his old age.

Currently Rafael needs a loan to buy some machines that will allow him to improve his production and thereby attract even more customers.  His hands are what have made the work but he would like to increase his machinery so that he can expand his business even more.

loans.use: To buy tools

loans.name: Zoila Albina

texts.es:
Zoila madre soltera crio a su hijo sola, tiene su propio negocio un cafetín en donde ella obtiene el sustento diario. Los planes para futuro que el nivel de vida mejore. Su hijo se prepare. Proyecto mejorar por completo su vivienda obteniendo comodidad y seguridad. El préstamo será invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedra, piedrín, Bloques, alambre de amarre, clavos de acero, hierro, ladrillo y otros materiales.
Agradeciendo a la financiera por el apoyo al mejoramiento social de su familia.
texts.en: Zoila is a single mother who raised her son on her own. She has her own business, a little cafe where she makes her living every day. Her plans for the future are to improve her standard of living, give her son a good education and improve her home to make it safe and comfortable. The loan will be invested in the purchase of building materials such as cement, sand, stones, gravel, blocks, mooring wires, iron, bricks and other materials. She is grateful for the support received to improve the situation of her family.

loans.use: Buy building materials.

loans.name: Maritza Monica

texts.es:
Maritza es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia de Chucuito – Juli, departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene solo 1 hijo.   Maritza estudió la secundaria completa. 
Tiene un negocio de venta de enaguas (prenda de vestir femenina), la mercadería es comprada el La Paz y Desaguadero, para finalmente venderla en la feria de Juliaca.  Su esposo trabaja de chofer (transportista) en la ruta provincial desaguadero - puno. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace un año, el primer préstamo que fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 1500.00 nuevo soles, comprará  enaguas al por mayor y así incrementar la mercadería de su negocio.
 Su sueño es  salir adelante y tener una casa en Juliaca.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es bromear con las demás socias.
texts.en:
Maritza is a member of the “María Asunción Galindo” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito-Juli province, in Puno department.  She is 25 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child.  She completed her high school studies.

Maritza has a business selling 'enaguas' (traditional underskirts).  She buys her merchandise in La Paz and Desaguadero and sells it in Juliaca markiet.  Her husband works as a public transport driver on the Desaguadero - Puno route.

Maritza has been working with Movimiento Manuela R. for one year.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business.  She will use the 1,500 Peruvian soles from this loan to buy 'enaguas' wholesale and thereby increase her stock.

Maritza's dream is to get ahead in life and own a house in Juliaca.  What she likes about her community bank is having a laugh with the other members.

loans.use: To buy 'enaguas' (traditional underskirts) wholesale

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia es socia del  Banco Comunal “María Asunción Galindo”, ubicado en el distrito D. Juli, provincia D. Chucuito – Juli, departamento D. Puno, tiene 51 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.  Solo pudo estudiar la primaria pero no la terminó.
Está empezando trabajar con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos. Tiene como actividad económica, la venta D. pescados como jurel, cabinza y otros pescados del mar.  
Ella requiere un préstamo D.   S/ 500.00 nuevo soles,  dinero que le permitirá incrementar la mercadería D. su negocio, comprará pescados al por mayor.
Lo que le impacto por primera vez  del Banco Comunal es la promoción al ahorro.. “Manuela Ramos te enseña a mejorar tu economía en base al ahorro y la buena inversión”.
texts.en:
Delia is a member of the “María Asunción Galindo” community bank which is located in Juli district, in Chucuito-Juli province, in Puno department.  She is 51 years old, married, and has 4 children.  She only had the opportunity to study at elementary school level and she didn't complete elementary school.

Delia is just starting to work with Movimiento Manuela Ramos.  Her business activity is selling fish such as horse mackerel, cabinza and other sea fish.

Delia requires a loan for 500 Peruvian soles which will allow her to increase her stock.  She will buy fish wholesale.  What first struck Delia about her community bank was the way they promoted savings...  "Manuela Ramos teaches you to improve your finances by saving and investing wisely".

loans.use: To buy fish wholesale

loans.name: Escarlet Lourdes

texts.es:
Escarlet soltera, trabaja en una empresa privada como conserje desde hace un tiempo. Sus planes son mejorar la infraestructura de sus vivienda  ya que requiere construir un anexo para cuarto y asi tiene mayor comodidad. 
Solicitad el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como: cemento, hierro, laminas, bloques, arena, piedrín, perlines, reglones, alambre de amarre y otros materiales.Obteniendo seguridad, protección.
texts.en: Scarlet is single and has worked in a private company as a janitor for a while.  Her plans are to make improvements to her home including building a new annex, which would make it more comfortable.  She is requesting the loan to buy construction materials such as: cement, iron, sheets, blocks, sand, gravel, casters, screeds, wire and other materials. The improvements will provide protection and security.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials.

loans.name: Jhon David

texts.es:
A sus 25 años Jhon David A. A. ya es un emprendedor, pues la falta de oportunidades y la necesidad de ayudar con los gastos del hogar y sostener a su madre y a su abuela, se vio obligado a iniciar su propio negocio para salir adelante. 

Fue desde hace dos años cuando inició con la cría de codornices para la venta de huvos, lo que le ha permitido apoyar a su familia. Jhon David, necesita del préstamo para comprar un módulo de 5 pisos donde pueda acomodar más codornices, las cuales también necesita comprar. 

En el futuro, este joven luchador espera ampliar su negocio hasta vender huevos de codorniz incluso a otros municipios de Antioquia-Colombia, pues actualmente su mercado se encuentra en el municipio de Urrao de donde es oriundo.
texts.en:
At only 25 years old, Jhon David A. A. is already an entrepreneur.  Faced with a lack of opportunities and the need to help with the household expenses and support his mother and grandmother, he set up his own business in order to get ahead in life.

Two years ago he started raising quails in order to sell their eggs.  This has enabled him to support his family.  Jhon David needs a loan to buy a 5 tiered unit in which he can accommodate more quails.  He also needs to buy more quails.

In the future, this hard-working young man hopes to expand his business so that he can sell quail eggs to other towns in Antioquia-Colombia since right now his market is in the town of Urrao which is his home town.

loans.use: To buy a cage and some quails

loans.name: Melvin Salvador

texts.es: Melvin Salvador de 25 años, vive en el barrio Carlos Fonseca. Es hombre soltero casado. Su actividad es brindar el servicio de barbería, hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio,  el joven comenzó como ayudante y así fue que aprendió este medio de vida debido a su pobreza y la necesidad de buscar el alimento. La mayoría de sus clientes son jóvenes adultos, adolescentes y público en general. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta siempre segur con este negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de cepillos, peines, herramientas, tijeras, guantes entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Melvin Salvador, age 25, lives in the Carlos Fonseca neighborhood.  He is a single man.  His business is providing barber services.  He has had this business for four years.

This young man started as a helper.  He learned this way of life due to his poverty and the need to look for food.

Most of his customers are young adults, adolescents, and the general public.  Among his plans for the future is to always continue with this business.

The loan he is requesting is to buy brushes, combs, tools, scissors, and gloves, among other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Allison Joseph

texts.es: Alisson Josehp tiene 32 años, ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, hace más de 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad. Ella decidió iniciar este negocio con le propósitos de mantener a sus 3 hijos que son lo más importante y el motivo de su lucha, pero se vio muy afectada ya que por las mañanas tiene que alistar su bolso para ofrecer los diferentes productos que le solicitan, la mayoría de sus clientes son jóvenes. Ella solicita este medio de vida para la compra de cosméticos, calzado, ropa en general entre otras cosas. Ella desea proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Alisson Josehp is 32 and has made a living selling general merchandise for more than 8 years.  She decided to start this business in order to support her three children who are most important and what motivate her to keep going.  She found it difficult because she has to get the bags ready in the mornings to be able to offer the variety of products that are sought after.  Most of her customers are young people.  She is taking out this loan to purchase make up, shoes, general clothing and other things.  She would also like to make some improvements to her home.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more merchandise

loans.name: Doris Elisa

texts.es: Doris Elisa tiene 44 años, su actividad es la veta de mercadería en general. Este negocio lo inicio con esfuerzo propio, ya que siempre le ha gustado mejorar sus ingresos. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos, por lo que se siente muy agradecida con este medio de vida. El financiamiento es para la compra de cosméticos, trajes, ropa interior, tratamientos entre otras cosas. Sueña con mejorar su capital de trabajo y aumentar cada día más su inventario.
texts.en:
Doris Elisa is 44 years old.  Her business is selling general merchandise.  She started her business through her own efforts since she has always liked to improve her income.  This is not the first time that she has requested a loan.  She feels very thankful to be in this line of work.

This loan will be used to buy cosmetics, dresses, underwear, treatments, and other products.  Doris Elisa dreams of improving her working capital and continuing to increase her stock.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Elver

texts.es: Elver, de 30 años de edad, natural del distrito de kimbiri, es un Joven muy alegre y trabajador; convive con Raquel de 25, juntos tienen dos hijos, Rabí de 03 años y Bill de 01 año de edad y todos viven en su propia casa en la Comunidad de Kimbiri Alto. Elver, es un hombre de mucho provecho, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y cuenta con 06 hectáreas de terreno; donde ha cultivado, café, hojas de coca, cacao y barbasco; que son plantas oriundas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Ha trabajado durante 10 años y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos y comercializa dichos productos a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo de cada producto que vende. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos de cacao, café y hojas  de coca pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar en su producción. Para así darle una buena estabilidad económica a  su  familia. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo y esta dispuesto a cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Agradece a la institución Prisma por concederle el préstamo. Con los  2,500 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas de cacao y café.
texts.en:
Elver is 30 years old and from Kimbiri district.  He is a very cheerful and hard-working young man.  He lives with 25 year-old Raquel and together they have two children: 3 year-old Rabí and 1 year-old Bill.  They live in their own home in Kimbiri Alto community.

Elver is a very hard-working man who puts a lot of care into farming his land.  Elver is a farmer and he has 6 hectares of land where he grows coffee, coca leaf, cacao and barbasco.  These are all plants which are native to the jungle region of the Apurimac Valley.  Elver has been working for 10 years and during harvest time he has the support of laborers.  In this way, he harvests his crops quickly and sells them to traders who pay him very well for each kilogram of produce that he sells.

Elver considers that the most difficult part of his work is transporting his products from the farm to the town of San Francisco which is where they offer him the best prices for his cacao beans, coffee and coca leaf.   However, right now he is giving priority to buying more land so that he can sow more crops and expand his production in order to provide his family with good financial stability.

This is Elver's first loan with MFP.  He feels that this support will help him a lot in making progress in his work and he is ready to make his loan repayments according to schedule.  He is grateful to Prisma for offering him the loan.  He will use the 2,500 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy cacao and coffee seeds.

loans.use: To buy cacao and coffee seeds

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Cirila cerafina C. C., 45 años de edad, natural de la cuidad de Huancayo, socia activa y de mucho empeño de la alcancìa comunal "Virgen del carmen".
Cirila es madre soltera, ella mantiene sola a sus 3 hijos; pues lleva separada hace 10 años.
Cirila alquila una pequeña tienda, donde vende golosinas al por menor y ademàs se dedica al bordado de trajes tìpicos, disfraces para las fiestas costumbristas de la regiòn (como por ejemplo la fiesta de Santiago y el Huaylas)
El crèdito lo invertirà para la compra de mejores hilos para sus bordados.
(En la fotografia, Cirila esta vestida de chompa color gris y es la primera de la derecha)
texts.en:
Cirila Cerafina C. C. is 45 years old and from the city of Huancayo.  She is an active and hard-working member of the "Virgen del Carmen" community bank.

Cirila is a single mother and is solely responsible for her three children as she has been separated for 10 years.

Cirila rents a small store where she sells candy retail.  She also embroiders traditional outfits and costumes for regional fiestas (for example, the Santiago fiesta and the Huaylas fiesta).

Cirila will invest her loan in buying better threads for her embroidery.

(In the photo, Cirila is wearing a gray jacket.  She is the lady on the far right).

loans.use: To buy threads for her embroidery

loans.name: Marta Inés

texts.es:
Desde los 14 años de edad, Marta Inés Z. V. aprendió a coser al lado de su madre, desde entonces se ha dedicado a este oficio que le ha permitido ganarse la vida. Fue hace algunos años, con la esperanza de labrarse un buen porvenir, cuando desde su pueblo natal, Concordia emprendió viaje hacia Medellín-Colombia, ciudad donde esperaba superarse y mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Desde entonces, empezó a mejorar su trabajo y a ofrecer sus servicios a sus vecinos y conocidos y fue así como fue perfeccionando su trabajo. Actualmente, Marta Inés necesita de un préstamo para comprar una máquina de coser familiar que le permitirá realizar varias tareas y agilizar su trabajo para cumplir con mayor prontitud con sus pedidos.

En un futuro Marta Inés sueña con ampliar su negocio hasta convertirse en una empresaria de verdad como ella misma lo afirma.
texts.en:
When she was 14 years old, Marta Inés Z. V. learned to sew at her mother's side.  Ever since, she has worked in this profession and it has allowed her to earn a living.  Some years ago, with the hope of building a good future for herself, she left her home village of Concordia and travelled to Medellín-Colombia, a city where she hoped she could improve herself and her quality of life.

Since that time, she has improved her work and she now offers her services to her neighbors and acquaintances.  In this way, she has perfected her work.  Currently, Marta Inés needs a loan so that she can buy a sewing machine that will allow her to do a number of tasks and make her work easier so that she can fill her orders more quickly.

In the future, Marta Inés dreams of expanding her business and becoming 'a real businesswoman' as she puts it.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino, de 45 años de edad, natural del distrito de Quimbiri, convive con Melisa de 35 años de edad y tienen 03 hijos; viven en su casa propia en la comunidad de San Luis departamento de Cusco. Marcelino, es un hombre de mucho provecho, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y cuenta con 08 hectáreas de terreno; donde ha cultivado, café, hojas de coca y cacao; frutos oriundos de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Ha trabajado durante 10 años y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos y comercializa dichos productos a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo de cada productos que vende. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos; pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar en su producción. Para  así darle una buena estabilidad económica a  su  familia. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho con el progreso de su trabajo y esta dispuesto a cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Agradece a la institución Prisma por concederle el crédito. Con los  2,000 nuevos soles solicitados,  contratará jornaleros para realizar el desmonte de las malezas que aquejan sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 45 years old and from Quimbiri district.  He lives with 35 year-old Melisa and they have 3 children with whom they live in their own home in San Luis community, in Cusco department.  Marcelino is a very hard-working man who puts a lot of care into farming his land.  He is a farmer and has 8 hectares of land where he grows coffee, coca leaf and cacao, all of which are native crops of the jungle area of the Apurimac Valley.  

Marcelino has been working for 10 years and during harvest time he has the support of laborers.  In this way he is able to quickly harvest his crops and sell them to the traders who pay him very well for every kilogram of produce that he sells.  He considers the most difficult part of his work to be transporting his products from the farm to the town of San Francisco where they offer him the best prices for his products.  However, right now, his goal is to buy new land so that he can grow more crops and increase his production in order to provide his family with good financial stability.

This is Marcelino's first loan from MFP and he feels that this support will help him a lot in making progress in his work.  He is ready to make his loan repayments according to schedule.  He is grateful to Prisma for offering him the loan.  He will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles he has requested to hire laborers to get rid of the weeds that are attacking his plantations.

loans.use: To hire laborers to help him weed his farm

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan tiene 70 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su familia en el en el distrito la Matanza ubicado en la Provincia de Morrropon que pertenece a la región Piura, que se ubica a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo capital de la Región de la Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde hace muchos años, el suele sembrar maíz amarillo en un pequeño terreno de cultivo con el que cuenta, luego de la cosecha lo vende a buen precio. Esta actividad la realiza hace 5 años, cuenta con clientela establecida.

Juan desea realizar  cambios en su casa para mejorar su calidad de vida. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
70-year old Juan is married and lives with his family in Matanza district in the province of Morropon, part of the region of Piura. Matanza is more than four hours away from the town of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Juan has earned his living in agriculture for many years. Usually he grows yellow corn in his small plot of land, then harvests it and sells it for a good price. He’s been growing corn for five years and has regular customers for his produce.

He now wishes to make some alterations to his house and improve his standard of living. For this reason he is seeking a loan of 1500 soles from Kiva partner, Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to improve his living conditions

loans.name: Genesis Group

texts.es:
La Asociación Comunal   ”GENESIS”, está iniciando su cuarto ciclo en el centro focal de Germán Busch.  Esta asociación comunal cuenta con la participación de once integrantes.  La  mesa directiva tiene como presidenta a la señora Ana, como tesorera a la señora Margarita y como secretaria de actas a la señora Ines. Los negocios de las señoras son diferentes, entre ellos tenemos:    venta de artículos de Ferretería, venta de comida, artesanía en polainas, venta de Fresco, cultivo de F. y venta, taller de cerrajería, venta de ropa interior, albañil, tejido de enaguas.
La señora Ana, presidenta de la asociación "Génesis" es una mujer que ya tiene la experiencia de tres ciclos en el trabajo con asociaciones comunales.  Desde hace ocho meses,  la señora Ana tiene como negocio la venta de comida.  Ella vende comida en el domicilio, por ahora no cuenta con la ayuda de nadie, sin embargo, es una gran ventaja el tener el negocio en la casa, por que de esta manera ella puede cuidar a sus 3 hijos junto con su esposo.
texts.en:
The 11-member Genesis Community Association is starting its fourth loan cycle in the Germán Busch centre. The president of the Board of Directors is Señora Ana, treasurer is Señora Margarita, and secretary is Señora Ines. The members of the group have a range of businesses such as hardware store, food sales, knitting leg warmers, soft drinks sales, growing and selling flowers, locksmith’s shop, underwear sales, builder, and skirt weaving.

President Ana has already been through three loan cycles with community associations. She has had a business selling food from her home for eight months. She has no employees so it is a great advantage to be able to work from home as she can care for her three children and husband at the same time.

loans.use: to buy rice, pasta, oil, potatoes

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro se dedica a la venta de pesca artesanal. Tiene más de 31 años en su negocio. Inicio por la necesidad de mejorar los ingresos de la familia. el ha sido siempre una persona muy luchador, pues con sus propios ingresos ha logrado salir adelante. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues se siente muy satisfecho con su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de   gasolina para el motor, redes entre otra cosa.
texts.en: Genaro earns his living by selling fish, a job he’s been doing for more than 31 years. He started his business because he needed to earn more money to support his family. He’s always been a hard worker so he’s managed to make progress in life. This is not the first time that Genaro has taken on a loan because he feels satisfied that his business is going well. With the money he wishes to buy gasoline for his engine, nets, etc.

loans.use: to invest in his fishing business

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Sufrir el desarraigo D. su tierra debido al desplazamiento por la violencia, así como la pérdida D. su esposo y uno D. sus hijos, han sido algunos D. los fuertes golpes que la vida le ha dado a Luz Marina P. D. O., quien a sus 60 años D. edad, recuerda esta situación con gran nostalgia y la tristeza propia D. quien ha sufrido esta realidad. 

Fue entonces cuando pasando por un momento difícil pero con la obligación D. sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos, Luz Marina, con la ayuda D. una amiga empezó vendiendo legumbres en dos canastas, desD. entonces se ha esforzado por hacer D. su negocio su fuente D. sustento y el D. su familia. 

Gracias a su empuje, Luz Marina cuenta con una legumbrería para la cual necesita D. un préstamo para comprar estantería que le permitirá organizar mejor sus productos para ser ofrecidos a sus clientes. 

Que el negocio crezca cada vez más es el sueño D. esta luchadora incansable.
texts.en:
Being uprooted from her native land due to violence, losing her husband and losing one of her children... these have been some of the heavy blows that life has dealt to Luz Marina P. D. O. who, at 60 years old, remembers the situation with the sadness of one who has suffered this reality.

Passing through this difficult period of her life, Luz Marina was also faced with the need to get her four children ahead.  With the help of one of her friends, she started selling vegetables from two baskets.  Since then, she has worked hard to turn her business into a source of maintenance for herself and her family.

Thanks to her drive and determination, Luz Marina now owns a fruit and vegetable store.  She needs a loan to buy shelves as this will enable her to better organize the products that she sells to her customers.

The dream of this tireless fighter is for her business to keep growing.

loans.use: To buy shelves

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Doña María tiene 47 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, residen en Jiquilisco departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la venta D. semilla D. Marañón, aprendió a prepararlas por sus familiares quienes le enseñaron a asarlas y luego limpiarlas, tiene 19 años D. dedicarse a este negocio y es el que por años D. le ha dado lo necesario para su hogar.
Ella necesita un préstamo para comprar más semillas, ya que D. las que dispone no alcanzan para vender durante el año, es por eso que al invertir piensa lograr una cantidad granD. para ya no incurrir en gastos a medio año.
