El propósito D. doña María es mejorar su situación D. comerciante y abastecer a los clientes D. este producto que es muy bueno. Uno D. sus sueños es alcanzar estabilidad económica por su dedicación al negocio, logrando en un futuro vivir más cómodamente.
texts.en:
María, 47, lives with her husband and children in Jiquilisco, Usulután department.  She sells cashew nuts.  She learned how to prepare them from relatives who taught her to roast and then clean them.  She’s been in this business for 19 years and it is what has provided for her family all this time.

She needs a loan to buy more nuts because the ones she has won’t last all year.  She feels that investing in them now provides enough of them for her not to have to make an additional expenditure at midyear.  María’s goal is to improve her situation as a merchant and supply her customers with this product which is very good.  One of her dreams is to reach economic stability through her dedication to her business managing to live more comfortably in the future.

loans.use: To buy cashews.

loans.name: Luz Radiante Group

texts.es:
Vilma P. Peña, 47 años de edad, madre soltera, con 02 hijos, preside el grupo comunal "Luz Radiante".
Vilma desde hace 6 años instalò en su vivienda una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, donde realiza ventas al por menor.
Vilma es padre y madre para sus hijos, pues elL. soL. veL. por el bienestar de ambos. 
Actualmente Vilma viene pasando por un momento muy doloroso pues perdiò hace pocos dìas a un ser muy querido y cercano, su padre.
El prèstamo otorgado lo invertirà en comprar golosinas para diverficiar e incrementar sus ingresos.
(En L. Fotografìa Vilma se encuentra en el centro del grupo, viste de chompa color blanco y casaca color gris)
texts.en:
Vilma P. Peña is 47 years old, a single mother, and has 2 children.  She is president of the "Luz Radiante" (Bright Light) community bank.

Six years ago, Vilma set up a small grocery store in her home.  She sells her products retail.

Vilma is both father and mother to her children since she is the only one who looks out for their well-being.

Vilma is going through a very painful moment in her life right now since, a few days ago, she lost someone very dear and close to her: her father.

Vilma will invest this loan in buying candies to diversify her stock and increase her income.

(In the photo, Vilma is in the center of the group, wearing a white sweater and gray jacket).

loans.use: To buy candies to diversify her stock

loans.name: Santos Simón

texts.es:
Santos es un padre de familia de  28 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío CP-3  del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, el cría gallinas, patos, pavos y ganado ovino en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad tiene una antigüedad de 4 años. Adicionalmente trabaja prestando servicio de transporte en su como mototaxi.

El desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus aves  y ganado ya que la demanda está aumentando. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Santos es un padre bastante entregado a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Santos is a 28 year-old father who lives with his wife and two children in his own home, in CP-3 village, in Tambogrande district, an agricultural area which is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Santos raises and sells small animals and poultry.  He raises hens, ducks, turkeys and sheep in an area behind his home and when the animals have reached a good level of development he offers them for sale to the traders who visit his area.  Santos has been in this business for 4 years.  He also works providing a transport service in his 'mototaxi' (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting passengers).

Santos would like to buy some balanced animal feed for his poultry and sheep since demand is increasing.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Santos is a father who is committed to his family and he is always looking out for their well-being and development.  Those who know him have a lot of respect and affection for him.

loans.use: To acquire balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Maira Marisa

texts.es:
Doña Mayra, D. 50 años D. edad, resiD. en Concepción Batres, departamento D. Usulután, vive con dos hijos D. 18 y 20 años D. edad y su esposo. Doña Mayra tiene negocio D. venta D. pupusas, aprendió la preparación con una hermana para la cual trabajaba, no tiene un horario fijo para vender las pupusas y por el momento necesita capital para comprar materiales y bebidas.
Ella solicita un préstamo el cual le ayudara a adquirir los materiales para la preparación D. las pupusas como chicharrón, quesillo, maíz, aceite y también bebidas, con esta inversión fortalecerá el negocio y tendrá lo necesario para aumentar la producción.
La aspiración D. ella es tener un negocio amplio, rentable para ayudar a su familia y tener una mejor solvencia económica.
texts.en:
Mayra, 50, lives in Concepción Batres, Usulután department with her two children who are 18 and 20 years of age and with her husband.  She sell pupusas (stuffed corn dough dumpling-like fast food) that she learned to make from a sister for whom she works.  She does not have a fixed schedule to sell the pupusas and for the moment needs capital to buy supplies and beverages.

She is asking for a loan that will help her get the materials she needs to make pupusas like:  fried pork rind, cheese, corn, oil and also beverages.  The investment will strengthen the business and she’ll have what’s necessary to increase production.  Her goal is to have a large, profitable business to help her family and have economic solvency.

loans.use: To buy fried pork rind, cottage cheese, corn, oil and beverages.

loans.name: Lucia Lourdes

texts.es: El señora Lucia dedicada a la venta de ropa, tiene su puesto de venta en el mercado central de la ciudad teniendo una venta mas efectiva por las noches ya que existe mucha mas afluencia de personas por ese mercado. Ocupando su tiempo por el día en la supervisión y cuidado de sus pequeños quienes se encuentran en edad escolar y ella los lleva a la escuela y ayudarlos en sus tareas, y por las noches los deja con su padre para ella poder ir a vender su mercadería, el crédito que solicito es para poder incrementar su mercadería comprando ropa por docena, la Sra. Lucia es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Lucia sells clothing. She has a stall in the central market in the city and she sells more in the evenings, when the influx of visitors is higher. During the day she supervises and looks after her children of school age, taking them to school and helping them with their homework. In the evening she leaves them with their father and goes to sell her merchandise. She is requesting a loan to increase her stocks by purchasing clothes by the dozen. Lucia is a very hard working woman and she is grateful to the institution for the support received.

loans.use: Purchase clothing by the dozen.

loans.name: G.s. Enmanuel Group

texts.es: Fátima Ines es casada, tiene 29 años vive con sus dos hijos menores de edad. Hace 8 años que se dedica a la venta de mariscos. Comenzó por herencia de su Mama ya que les enseño como sobrevivir para mantener a su familia. Daniel Antonio tiene una pulpería,  el es una persona emprendedora y disfruta de relacionarse con sus clientes. Ellos conforman el grupo solidario Enmanuel. Por lo que solicitan estos créditos para la compra de materia prima para sus negocios.
texts.en: Fátima Ines, 29,  is married and lives with her two under-age children. She has been selling seafood for the last 8 years. She inherited it from her mother, who showed her how to survive and support her family. Daniel Antonio owns a store. He's an entrepreneur and enjoys dealing with his customers. They make up the Enmanuel solidarity group and are requesting the loans to purchase raw materials for their businesses.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Demetria

texts.es: Demetria D. 57 años D. edad, natural del distrito D. Quimbiri, esta casada con Isidro D. 58 años y tienen 02 hijos Linda D. 21 años y Marilyn D. 19 años juntos residen en su propia casa en la  comunidad D. nueva esperanza departamento D. Cusco. Demetria y su esposo Isidro, son el sostén D. su hogar por el cual se esmeran cada día por el mejor bienestar D. su familia, Demetria se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesina y cuenta con 11 hectáreas D. terreno; donD. ha cultivado, cacao, hojas D. coca, café, plátano y cítricos. Ha trabajado durante 30 años y en tiempos D. cosecha cuenta con el apoyo D. la mano ajena por lo cual contrata jornaleros; D. esa manera podrá cosechar más rápido y poder comercializar D. manera vertiginosa dichos productos a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo D. cada producto que venD.. El problema D. su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos, que perjudican a sus plantaciones, pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar mas plantones D. cítricos para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar en su producción. Para  así darle una buena estabilidad económica a  su familia y pasar con tranquilidad su edad longeva. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene la responsabilidad D. pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesta a hacerlo. Se siente muy agradecida con la institución por facilitarle el crédito solicitado. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará un lote D. terreno en donD. construirá su casa ha base D. material noble, ubicada en la ciudad D. Quimbiri.
texts.en:
Demetria is 57 years old and originally from the district of Quimbiri. She is married to Isidro, 58, and they have two children: Linda, 21 years old, and Marilyn, 19 years old. They all live in a house they own in the Nueva Esperanza community in the department of Cusco. Demetria and her husband Isidro are the pillar of their home and work hard every day to ensure the well being of their family. 

Demetria is devoted to her work. She is a farmer and ploughs the land; she has 30 hectares of land, where she grows cocoa, coca leaves, coffee, banana and citrus fruits. She has worked for 30 years. During the harvest she hires labourers to help her, so as to harvest faster and quickly sell her products to the wholesalers, who pay her very well for every kilogram of product she sells them. The problem with her work is being unable to combat the insects that damage her crops. However, her priority at the moment is to buy more citrus plants in order to expand her crops and increase production, so as to proviD. her family with financial security and have a quiet old age. 

This is her first loan with MFP. She is aware that she is responsible for paying all installments on time and she is prepared to do so. She is very grateful to the institution for having provided her with the requested loan. With the 3,000 soles requested she will buy a plot of land in the city of Quimbiri where she will build her home with solid materials.

loans.use: Buy a plot of land where to build her home.

loans.name: Blanca Dayssi

texts.es:
Doña Blanca de 43 años de edad, reside en Usulután, tiene dos hijos con quienes vive y la casa donde residen es propia.  Ella es empleada de una comercial llamada Electrocentro y a la vez vende medicamentos, el trabajo lo posee hace 12 años y la venta hace 5 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar medicina y comprar materiales de construcción, pues los medicamentos que desea comprar son muy demandados y la vivienda pues solamente quiere mejorar algunos daños que esta presenta.
Esta inversión le ayudara a tener a disposición de los clientes, medicamentos nuevos para aliviar las enfermedades más comunes y frecuentes.
La aspiración de doña Blanca es ampliar el negocio y recibir ganancias que logren cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Blanca, 43, lives in Usulután.   She has two children living with her in a house of her own.  She is an employee of a firm called Electocentro and she also sells medicine.  She’s had the job for 12 years and the medicine sales business for 5 years.

She needs the loan to buy medicine and building materials and supplies.  The medicine she needs to buy is very sought after and she also needs to do some home repairs.

This investment will help her have new medicine available for her customers to treat common, frequent illnesses.

Blanca’s goal is to expand the business and obtain profits to cover her household expenses

loans.use:
Part for building materials and supplies and part for medicineBlanca, 43, lives in Usulután.   She has two children living with her in a house of her own.  She is an employee of a firm called Electocentro and she also sells medicine.  She’s had the job for 12 years and the medicine sales business for 5 years.

She needs the loan to buy medicine and building materials and supplies.  The medicine she needs to buy is very sought after and she also needs to do some home repairs.

This investment will help her have new medicine available for her customers to treat common, frequent illnesses.

Blanca’s goal is to expand the business and obtain profits to cover her household expenses
.

loans.name: Gloria Betty

texts.es:
Gloria de 39 años de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, vive junto a sus siete hijos y una sobrina, el negocio de Gloria es la venta de frutas, tostadas de plátano y yuca, este negocio lo tiene ubicado en un barrio del centro de la cuidad, muy cercano de su lugar de residencia. Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de plátano y frutas de temporada como mangos, sandias, melones.
Con esta compra espera mejorar su negocio y ofrecer mayor cantidad a los clientes, en busca de recibir mejores ganancias para lograr sus objetivos que son estudiar a sus hijos y terminar la construcción de su casa para vivir cómodamente en su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Gloria is 39 years old and lives in San Francisco Gotera, Department of Morazán.  She lives with her seven children and a niece.  Gloria has a business selling fruit and plaintain and yuca tostadas.  Her business is located in a downtown neighborhood, which is very close to their place of residence.  

She is currently seeking a loan to buy plaintains and seasonal fruit such as mangos, watermelons, and melons.  With this purchase, she hopes to improve her business and offer more to her customers.  She is looking for better returns to achieve her objectives of having her children study and to complete the construction of their house so that they can live comfortably in their own home.

loans.use: To buy seasonal fruit and plaintains.

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 58 años de edad, es viuda y reside junto a sus tres hijos en el caserío Cruceta  del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de bebidas como cerveza y chicha de jora, además ella ofrece piqueos, comida en venta a sus vecinos y personas que vienen a trabajar en la zona, El negocio tiene una antigüedad de más de 10 años y es de mucha ayuda para su familia, ya que por medio de los ingresos que percibe ayuda al sostenimiento de su economía familiar.

Julia desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de productos, sillas y mesas ya que la demanda por su negocio ha aumentado. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Julia, 58, is a widow who lives with her 3 children in the rural Cruceta settlement in the Tambogrande district.  This is an agricultural area located in the Piura region, located more than 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

Julia has a business where she sells drinks, such as beer and "chicha de jora" (a corn-based Peruvian beverage), and snacks.  She sells to her neighbors and to people who come to work in the area.  She has had this business for more than 10 years, and it is a big help to her family because with the income that she earns she helps to support her family.

Julia wants to expand her business by buying products, chairs and tables, since the demand for her business has increased. To do this she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 Peruvian soles, which will allow her to achieve this objective.

loans.use: to buy products, chairs and tables for her business

loans.name: Elmer Amilcar

texts.es:
Elmer, reside en Osicala departamento de Morazán, tiene 31 años de edad, su familia la conforman su esposa y una hija de dos años de edad, él se dedica a la panadería, desde hace dos años, el aprendió cuando se desempeñaba como trabajador de panadería lo cual aprendió perfectamente el proceso de hacer el pan, vende sus productos en los municipios  cercanos tres días por semana.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ladrillos y maya, para cercar el contorno de la panadería, ya que para él es muy necesario tener en mejores condiciones la panadería y espera realizar una buena inversión.
Su sueño es crecer con el negocio, ampliar el local y dar empleo a otras personas que necesitan también una fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Elmer lives in Osicala, Morazán department.  He’s 31 years old and his family is composed of his wife and a two year old daughter.  He’s been a baker for two years.  He learned while working as an employee in a bakery so he learned the bread making process perfectly.  He sells his products in nearby towns three days a week.

He is asking for the loan to buy bricks and wire mesh to enclose the bakery’s perimeter because it’s very necessary for him to have better conditions in the bakery and he hopes to make a good investment.

His dream is to grow with the business, to expand the locale and provide employment to other people who also need sources of income.

loans.use: To buy bricks and wire mesh.

loans.name: Shaher

texts.en:
Shaher is a 45-year-old man from Ramallah city in Palestine. Shaher is a blacksmith. He works in a workshop in Ramallah and runs a small store in the city. Shaher is a father of two daughters and three sons. Shaher's sons are young school students.

Shaher took a loan from FATEN to expand the store and include a larger variety of goods in his inventory to attract more customers in a big city like Ramallah. This will secure a better income and improve the financial situation of a big family like his.

Shaher was photographed in FATEN's office.

loans.use: Increasing the variety of goods sold in the store

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: El señor Daniel  casado con la Sra. Elsa hace 20 años que viven en Sombrerito donde tienen su parcela y trabajan agricultura juntamente con su esposa y sus hijos, también se dedican a la ganadería y en agricultura siembra papa, maíz y arroz. Todo lo que cosecha, el lo saca a la venta en el mercado mas cercano, su esposa es quien le ayuda con lo que es la comercialización de sus productos, con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas para la siembra de papa y también para lo que implica  el preparado de la tierra, es una persona muy trabajadora siempre pensando en el bienestar de sus familia, esta agradecido con la institución por el poyo brindado.
texts.en:
Daniel is married to Elsa and for twenty years they have lived in Sombrerito where they have a plot of land which they farm.  Daniel lives with his wife and children.  He grows potatoes, corn and rice and he also raises livestock.  He sells all the crops that he harvests in the nearest market.  His wife helps him to sell his produce.

Daniel will use the money from his loan to buy potato seeds and to prepare his land for sowing.  He is a very hard-working person who is always thinking of his family's well-being.  He is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered him.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Don Juan de 42 años de edad, reside en San Simón departamento de Morazán, es soltero y vive solo administrando una farmacia, este negocio inicio hace 8 años ya que trabajo anteriormente en un farmacia como vendedor lo que le dio la experiencia para tratar con los clientes y manejar los precios de los medicamentos, su horario es de 7:00am a 8:00pm.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para comprar vitaminas, sueros, analgésicos, que son de los más demandados por los clientes y al tener el préstamo comprara por cantidades grandes al mayoreo permitiéndole tener un mejor precio por parte de sus proveedores.
El sueño que quiere realizar don Juan es instalar una sucursal en otro lugar e ir creciendo como microempresario.
texts.en:
Juan, 42, lives in San Simón, Morazán department.  He’s single and lives alone running a pharmacy.  He started the business 8 years ago since he used to work as a salesperson in a pharmacy and got the experience of taking care of customers and managing medicine prices.  His schedule is 7am to 8pm.

He is asking for the loan to buy vitamins, serums and analgesics which are the items most requested by customers.  Having the loan will allow him to buy them in large quantities at wholesale thus allowing for better prices from his suppliers.

Juan’s dream is to open a branch in another place and to continue to grow as a micro businessman.

loans.use: To buy vitamins, serums and analgesics to sell.

loans.name: Angel Simon

texts.es: El sr. Angel es cliente nuevo de la institución vive en la casa de sus padres ellos los últimos años estuvieron viviendo en Santa Cruz pero decidieron vivir en La Paz por sus hijos ya que decidieron hacerles estudiar en esta ciudad el sr. Angel trabaja haciendo fotograbados (insignias para los colegios y distintivos de club deportivos) además realiza la numeración de las puertas de casa este trabajo lo realiza puerta a puerta ya  que no tiene una ofician propia, el crédito que esta solicitando es para la compra de material para continuar con su trabajo, es una persona muy creativa y trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Angel is a new client of our institution.  He lives in his parents' home.  They used to live in Santa Cruz but they moved to La Paz for their children since they decided to send them to school in this city.

Angel works making photoengravings (emblems for schools and sporting clubs).  He also makes house numbers.  He makes his sales door to door since he doesn't have his own office.  He will use the loan he is requesting to buy material so that he can continue with his work.  He is a very creative and hard-working person.  He is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered him.

loans.use: To buy materials for his photoengravings

loans.name: Luz Marleni

texts.es:
Luz  tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su esposo y su hija en el sector Urrunaga del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz. Uno de los distritos más poblados de la región Lambayeque, caracterizado principalmente por tener altos índices de pobreza, ya que las personas viven generalmente en zona urbana marginal que carecen de servicios básicos.

Se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños en general, esta actividad la realiza hace dos años. Ella ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece en el exterior del mercado Atusparias de este distrito. Esta actividad es de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia y se vale de ella para ayudar a su esposo con el mantenimiento de la economía diaria.

Luz desea adquirir más mercadería para ampliar su negocio ya que durante esta temporada la demanda por su negocio aumenta asimismo desea adquirir productos para la temporada escolar. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar su objetivo.

Luz es una madre bastante trabajadora y empeñosa, las personas que le conocen admiran sus ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
texts.en:
Luz is 42 years old, married and lives with her husband and their daughter in the Urrunaga area of the José Leonardo Ortiz district. This is one of the most populated districts of the Lambayeque region and is characterized primarily by its high poverty index. Most of the people live in urban, marginalized zones that lack basic services. 

She sells clothing for children and she has been doing this for two years. Her clients can pay for the products on credit or with cash and she sells the products on the outside of the Atusparias market in this district. This business is very helpful to her family's financial situation and it's very important that she can help her husband support their family.

Luz wants to add more merchandise in order to expand her business because the demand has risen. Additionally, she wants to add more products for the school year. Because of this, she has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 500 nuevos soles that will help her accomplish her goals. 

Luz is a hard-working mother and businesswoman. The people who know her admire her for her desires to progress and move ahead in life. 


.

loans.use: To acquire more merchandise in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Sofia Davila Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SOFIA DÁVILA” es un grupo que iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana.  Está compuesta por ocho mujeres.

La asociación comunal “SOFIA DÁVILA” organizó su mesa directiva de la siguiente manera: como presidenta, la señora  Walda  (este es su segundo ciclo en ese cargo), también se encuentra la tesorera la señora  Primitiva y como secretaria de actas la señora Constancia.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados, tienen que ver con el comercio, con los servicios y la producción.  Entre esos negocios tenemos: venta de verdura, tienda de venta de carne, tejido de mantas, costura, tejido de camas, carnicería, tienda de barrio.

En el caso de la señora Walda, presidenta de la asociación comunal, indica que  actualmente tiene como negocio el tejido de mantas.  La señora Walda trabaja en este rubro desde hace 30 meses. Las ventas son realizadas por menor en la feria de la Zona 16 de Julio, de manera ambulante, los días jueves y domingo.  También, de esta feria compra la materia prima para las mantas.  

Doña Walda es una mujer de  36 años de edad, vive con su pareja y sus cinco hijos.  El esposo trabaja  trasladando arena en una volqueta, la señora comenta con confianza que su pareja y ella se llevan bien.   El crédito que ha solicitado será destinado para incrementar el capital de trabajo y comprar lana.
texts.en:
The “SOFIA DÁVILA” communal bank is a group starting its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana Focal Center.  Eight women are members.

The “SOFIA DÁVILA” communal bank’s governing body is as follows: Walda is President (this is her second cycle in that position).  Primitiva is Treasurer and Constancia is Recording Secretary.  The businesses the members are involved in are varied; they have to do with commerce, service and production.  Among the businesses we have: vegetable sales, meat sales, blanket weaving, sewing, bed weaving, butcher shop and neighborhood grocery store.

Walda, communal bank President, indicates that she currently has a business weaving blankets.  She has been in this line of work for 30 months.  Sales are retail in the 16 de Julio zone’s market in an ambulatory fashion on Thursdays and Sundays.  She buys her raw materials for the blankets at this market too.

Walda is 36 years old living with her husband and their five children.   Her husband works transporting sand in a dump truck.  She tells us quite candidly that she and her husband get along together very well.

She will use the requested loan to increase working capital buying wool.

loans.use: To buy wool.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther tiene 34 años, vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en casa de un familiar. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a las tareas de la agricultura y esto la ha ayudado en la actualidad a generarse ingresos para su familia. Hace 1 año decidió radicar en la ciudad en busca de mejores oportunidades y desde entonces no ha dejado de dedicarse a la venta de sus cosechas así como de otros productos que compra al por mayor, además vende animales durante los fines de semana, actividad que por el momento lo realiza sola, pero espera pronto a una persona para que le ayude en el negocio. Hasta el momento ha visto que su negocio ha ido mejorando además de haber aprendido  las técnicas de ventas que le generan ganancias, una de ellas el de ofrecer un aumento o hacer una pequeña rebaja, por lo desea en adelante adquirir un puesto de ventas para evitar vender de manera ambulante. Es su primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta y motivada de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del crédito que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería ya que desea aprovechar la temporada de aumento de ventas que se avecina.
texts.en:
Esther, 34, lives with her two children in a relative’s house.  Since childhood she’s been farming and this has helped her earn family income to this day.  A year ago she decided to move to the city in search of better opportunities but she continues to sell her crops as well as other products she buys at wholesale.  On weekends she sells animals, an activity she’s currently doing by herself, but hopes soon to have a person to help her with the business.  She has seen her business improve to date plus she’s learned sales techniques that generate profits for her.  One of which is to slightly increase prices or offer a small discount.  She hopes soon to acquire a sales stand to stop being a street vendor.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is very happy and motivated knowing she has financial support and thanks all the people who will fund the loan she’s asking for because it will be very useful for her business’ progress.

She will use the requested loan to buy more merchandise to take advantage of the approaching high sales volume season.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi. a wife and mother of four sons, works with her husband in their land which produces tomatoes and cucumbers. Hanadi lives in Rafah in the Gaza Strip.

Hanadi took a loan from FATEN to purchase agricultural insecticides which will save their crops and increase their produce. Hanadi has been working in their land for 7 years now.

Hanadi's husband appears in the picture here as she is a religious woman, as are most Gaza Strip inhabitants.

loans.use: Purchasing agricultural insecticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase blocks and cement.

loans.name: Jose Hector

texts.es:
Don José, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, vive con dos hijas Ana Raquel de 9 años y  Angélica de 8 años de edad, el posee una tienda hace 16 años, el horario de ventas es de 6:30 am a 7:00pm, las dificultades de don José son las ventas al crédito ya que muchos clientes no regresan a cancelar su pendiente.
Pero aun así don José quiere invertir en mercadería solicitando un préstamo que le ayude a abastecer la tienda, comprando productos como aceite, arroz, huevos, jabón, ya que estos son demandados por sus clientes.
Este préstamo le diversificara los productos para ofrecer y así mejorar su atención y servicio. La aspiración de él es tener un negocio fuerte conservar buenos clientes, salir adelante con la ayuda de financiamiento.
texts.en:
José lives in Corinto, Morazán department with two daughters, Ana Raquel, 9, and Angélica, 8.  He has had a store for 16 years.  Its hours of operation are from 6:30am until 7pm.  José’s difficulties are sales on credit because lots of customers don’t return to pay their debts.

But, nevertheless, José wants to invest in merchandise and is asking for a loan to stock the store buying such items as: oil, rice, eggs and soap, since they are requested by his customers.

He will diversity his products with this loan to offer better customer service.  His goal is to have a strong business, to retain good customers and to get ahead with the loan’s assistance.

loans.use: To buy oil, rice, eggs and soap.

loans.name: Angela Yolanda

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

La señora Angela es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito. Tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad, la menor aun viven con ella y estudia en  la  Universidad. Su esposo es mecánico automotriz.

Ella realiza los créditos para ayudar a su esposo que tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz, para que el pueda comprar ciertas herramientas que aún le faltan para brindar un mejor servicio, él esposo  trabaja en su taller todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00 y a veces hasta más tarde cuando tiene mucho trabajo. Su especialidad son los remaches, nos cuenta que el  lleva con su taller ya por 16 años y que gracias a Dios le ha ido muy bien ya que no le falta el trabajo.

Este crédito es para comprar ciertas herramientas y materia prima para los remaches. Sus sueños son tener un carro en el futuro.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the 'La Inmaculada' community bank meets in the city of Tosagua.  This area is known for being very dynamic.  Most of its inhabitants work in crop farming and livestock raising.  It is an area with a lot of vegetation.

Angela is a founding member of her community bank and she likes it because the interest rates are lower than those of other institutions.  Angela is 43 years old, married, and has two grown-up children.  The youngest still lives with her and is studying at university.  Her husband is a mechanic.

Angela is taking a loan to help her husband, who has a garage, so that he can buy certain tools that he still needs in order to provide his customers with a better service.  Her husband works in his garage every day from 8.00am to 6.00pm and sometimes until later when there is a lot of work.  His speciality is doing bodywork.  She tells us that he has owned his garage for 16 years and, thanks to God, it has done very well since he is never short of work.

This loan will be used to buy certain tools and materials for her husband so that he can do his bodywork.  Angela's dream is to own a car in the future.

loans.use: To buy tools and rivets

loans.name: William Israel

texts.es:
Don William Gonzales, vive en San Miguel junto a sus dos hijos de dos y siete años de edad y su esposa, el tiene 31 años de edad, el es empleado trabajando como vendedor de una comercial de repuestos automotrices hace 7 años, realiza su trabajo durante toda la  semana de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.
El está solicitando un préstamo pues su vehículo familiar presenta problemas mecánicos y necesita llevarlo a hacerle ajustes a un taller. Este préstamo le ayudara a solventar esta situación  ya que él no tiene los fondos suficientes para cubrir el gasto.
La aspiración de Don William es continuar trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia y poder preparar  académicamente a sus hijos.
texts.en: Don William Gonzales lives in San Miguel with his two children, ages two and seven, and his wife.  He is 31 years old and has been working for an automobile parts company as a salesman for 7 years.  He works everyday from 7:00 am until 5:00 pm.  His family vehicle has been having mechanical problems so he is requesting a loan so that he can take it to a shop for adjustments.  This loan will help him to resolve this problem as he doesn't have sufficient funds to cover the expense.  Don William's goal is to continue working to provide for his family and to prepare his children academically.

loans.use: Repair and maintain his family vehicle

loans.name: Carmen Leonor

texts.es:
Carmen de 55 años, tiene bastaste tiempo  con el negocio de víveres. Puso una tienda en la casa de la hermana, hasta que pudo comprar un terreno en playas y desde hace 2 años puso su tienda en playas donde actualmente vive.

Abre desde muy temprano su tienda hasta las 19:00pm atiende sola su negocio. No tienen ningún obstáculo confía siempre en Dios para no tener dificultad e incrementar su tienda sin dificultades.

Carmen se caso pero hace 24 años está separada de su esposo. La abandono y hasta la actualidad no sabe nada de él. Tiene  4 hijas todas mayores de edad y con familia (37, 35, 28, y 25 años de edad). Con el préstamo va a comprar víveres y productos como bebidas, enlatados etc. 

Unos de sus metas es que desea tener un negocio grande y con una infraestructura muy buena y tener mucha clientela. No quedarse sola y que sus hijas siempre se encuentren juntas ayudándose entre sí  y pendientes de ella.
texts.en:
Carmen is 55 years old and has been in the food business for quite some time. She had a store out of her sister's house, until she was able to buy land along the beach. For the past two years she was able to put her shop along the beach where she currently lives. 

She opens her shop very early and works until 7:00pm. She doesn't have any obstacles and always trusts in God to grow her store without difficulties. 

Carmen was married but has been separated from her husband for 24 years. He abandoned her and she currently does not know anything of him. She has 4 daughters, all are older and have families (ages: 37, 35, 28, and 25). With the loan she is going to buy supplies and products such as drinks, canned foods, etc. 

One of her goals is to have a larger business with a good infrastructure and many customers. She does not remain alone, her daughters are always together helping each other and awaiting her.

loans.use: Beverages, rice, and canned foods.

loans.name: Nidia Marjorie

texts.es:
Nidia, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en San Miguel con su familia, tiene una hija de 10 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos, los ingresos que recibe de este negocio le ayudan a cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Ella inicio este trabajo por la necesidad de tener mayores ingresos, las ventas las realiza de forma ambulante todos los días de la semana.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de zapatos para distribución con ello ofrecerá mas productos a los clientes dándoles un mejor servicio y reteniéndolos para el futuro.
Su aspiración es sacar adelante a su hija, darle sus estudios.
texts.en:
Nidia is 25 years old and lives in San Miguel with her family.  She has a 10 year old daughter.  She sells clothing and shoes for a living and the income she brings in from this business helps to cover the household expenses.  She started this business out of a need to increase her income.  She sells as a street vendor everyday of the week.  

Currently, she is requesting a loan which she will use to buy shoes to resell.  This way she will be able to offer her customers more products and better service to retain their business in the future.  Her aspirations are to provide for her daughter and to give her an education.

loans.use: To purchase shoes to sell

loans.name: César

texts.es:
Cesar es un padre de familia de 33 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a su  hijo en el caserío Wiracocha - Valle Los Incas ubicado en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

El cuenta con un terreno agrícola en donde suele sembrar mango y limón, el ya tiene varios años de experiencia en esta actividad y durante este tiempo ha llegado a conocer mucho sobre el manejo de cultivos. Los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades los utiliza para solventar la economía diaria de su familia.

Cesar desea comprar fertilizantes para así brindar mantenimiento a su terreno de cultivo para instalar una nueva plantación de limón. De esta manera obtendrá una buena cosecha. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Cesar is a 33 year-old father who lives together with his wife and child in the village of Wiracocha - Valley of the Incas, in Tambogrande district, an agricultural area of Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Cesar has a plot of land where he grows mangos and lemons.  He has several years experience in this activity and, over the years, he has learned a lot about managing his crops.  He uses the income that he makes from these activities to cover his family's daily financial needs.

Cesar would like to buy fertilizers so that he can maintain his land in order to set up a new lemon orchard.  This will enable him to obtain a good harvest.  In order to achieve his goal, Cesar is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Jose Tomas

texts.es:
José, reside en San Miguel junto a su mamá, el es soltero, tiene 20 años de edad se dedica a la venta de cubrecamas y otros artículos relacionados al hogar, estos artículos los vende de forma ambulante y los da al crédito porque así se le hace más fácil venderlos.
El ha solicitado un préstamo el cual le ayudara para comprar diferentes colores y estilos de cubrecamas, fundas, colchas, esta inversión le ayudara a ofrecer a los clientes variedad de productos y espera que sea del agrado de ellos. 
Sus aspiraciones son comprar su propio vehículo para transportar la mercancía y estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
José lives in San Miguel with his mother.  He’s 20 years old and single.  He sells bedspreads and other articles for the home.  He sells them in an ambulatory manner and on credit because he finds that to be an easier way to sell them.

He has asked for a loan that will help him buy bedspreads, pillow cases and comforters in assorted colors and styles.  This investment will help him provide customers with a variety of products and he hopes they’ll like this.

His goals are to buy his own vehicle to transport his merchandise and to study at the university.

loans.use: To buy bedspreads in assorted sizes and colors.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Rosa, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 17, 16 y 11 años los mismos que estudian en Universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que además se dedica a preparar y vender bocadillos y comida rápida como: chuzos, alitas y pechugas de pollo asadas entre otros. Ella tiene su kiosco frente a la Universidad, mientras que su esposo tiene otro en el centro de Tosagua. Trabajan todos los días desde las 14h00 hasta las 21h00. Nos cuenta que lleva en este negocio por 16 años y que le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar aceite, plátano, carne, alas y pechugas de pollo y mas ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos. Lleva en el Banco Comunal ya por 13 años es la tesorera del banco y  le gusta por la seriedad de la institución. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the 'La Inmaculada' community bank meets in the city of Tosagua which is known for being a very dynamic place.  The majority of its inhabitants work farming crops and raising livestock.  It is noted as being an area with a lot of vegetation.

Here we meet Rosa.  Rosa is 44 years old and lives with her partner.  She has three children aged 17, 16 and 11.  They are studying at university, high school and elementary school.  Her husband is a salesman.

Rosa is a very good housewife who also works preparing and selling sandwiches and fast food such as kebabs, grilled chicken wings and chicken breast and other products.  She has a stand opposite the University and her husband has another one in the center of Tosagua.  They both work every day from 2.00pm to 9.00pm.  She tells us that she has been in this business for 16 years and it is doing very well.

Rosa will use this loan to buy oil, plantains, meat, chicken wings, chicken breast and other ingredients that she needs to prepare her food.  She has been a member of her community bank for 13 years and she is the bank's treasurer.  She likes the bank because of the reliability of the institution.  Her dream is for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: To buy oil, plantains, meat, chicken wings, chicken breast and other ingredients

loans.name: Victoria Lidia

texts.es:
Victoria de 64 años de edad empezó desde muy joven con su negocio para deleitar a los turistas que después de disfrutar de las hermosas playas suben a saborear del rico pescado frito. Con  un poco de ahorros mejoro su comedor comprando sillas y mesas y ahora amplio su menú para el gusto de los turista.  

Ella se levanta muy temprano para preparar desayunos, almuerzos y también merienda, trabaja con sus hijas e hijos quienes le ayudan en la preparación de los alimentos y en atender al cliente laboran desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. 

Está casada su esposo trabaja en la pesca artesanal laborando en su embarcación propia pescando  corvinas, camarones y diferentes moluscos para la venta. Todos sus hijos son mayores de edad y solo 2 le ayudan en el restaurante ubicado en la playa. Con el préstamo va a comprar sillas, mesas , parasol, mariscos, alimentos, jugos, colas, aguas. 

La meta de la Sr. Victoria es terminar de arreglar su comedor y su casa y poner un negocio  similar en el centro de la cuidad ya que tiene varios clientes que se los están solicitando
texts.en:
Victoria, 64, started very young in a business delighting tourists who would come to her restaurants for delicious fried fish after they enjoyed the beautiful beaches.  She was able to improve her dining area with a little savings by buying chairs, tables, and now she has expanded her menu to make it  more appealing to tourists.

She gets up very early to make breakfasts, lunches, and also suppers.  Her sons and daughters help her preparing the food and taking care of the customers-they work from 8 am until 6 pm.

She is married and her husband works in the fishing business with his own boat, catching sea bass, shrimp and various kinds of shellfish for sale.  All of her children are adults but only 2 help her in her restaurant on the beach.  She will use the loan to buy chairs, tables, umbrellas, shellfish, food, juices, sodas and fruit drinks.

Victoria’s goal is to finish setting up her restaurant and her house and to put a similar business in the city center since some customers are requesting that she open one there.

loans.use: Chairs, tables, shellfish

loans.name: Ronald Antonio

texts.es:
Ronald es soltero escogió esta actividad ya que estudiaba en la universidad y al ver que en el sitio faltaba un lugar para sacar copias y comprar útiles de oficina decidió ahorrar y realizar un préstamo para comprar una copiadora y una guillotina para realizar encuadernados y asi sacar copias  a los estudiantes de dicha universidad. 

Trabaja de lunes a viernes de 8:00am hasta las 6:00pm y los sábados hasta las 2 de la tarde realiza todo tipo trabajo de copias , además de encuadernación , em plastificación y anillados de folletos y lo complementa con la venta de útiles de oficina a veces recibe la ayuda de sus hermanos cuando él tiene que asistir a clases .

Con el préstamo va a comprar paquetes de hojas útiles de oficina copiadora a color
La meta de Ronald es terminar sus estudios universitarios, además de expandir su negocio al cual desea implementar el servicio de internet para las investigaciones de los estudiantes de la universidad
texts.en:
Ronald is single.  He chose this activity because while studying at the university he noticed that there wasn’t any place there to make copies and buy office supplies.  He decided to save up and take out a loan to buy a copying machine and a paper guillotine in order to make bindings and copies for the students at said university.

He works Monday through Friday from 8am until 6pm and on Saturdays until 2pm.  He makes all kinds of copies but also binds books, laminates and creates three-ring binders.  He complements this with the sale of office supplies.  When he has to attend classes his siblings help him out with the business. He will use the loan to buy reams of paper, office supplies and a color copier.

Ronald’s goal is to complete his university studies and expand his business where he wants to install Internet access so that the university students can do their research.

loans.use: For paper and a copying machine.

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité SOP SERIGNE FALLOU est crée le 30décembre 2009. Il est composé de 41 femmes qui sont du même village. Elles sont unies par des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d'affinité. Leurs activités principales c'est la transformation d'huile d'arachide, le petit commerce et l'élevage. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de KEUR NDIAGNA SAOUDA

Madame NIAMA S. (debout à l'extrême droite de la photo enroulée d'une écharpe blanche) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 48 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Ses proches lui ont confié la charge de quatre enfants.

Elle possède d'un réfrigérateur, ce qui lui permet de préparer des jus fruits naturel, de la crème glacée, de la glace etc. Elle vend aussi du savon, et un peu de légumes.Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus de quatre ans.

Son actuel crédit lui permettra de mieux développer son activité de petit commerce et d'en faire la promotion

Son objectif est de renforcer son épargne dans le Banc Villageois dans le but de faire l'extension de son activité commerciale
texts.en:
The solidarity group SOP SERIGNE FALLOU was created on December 30, 2009. It is composed of 41 women who are from the same village. They are united by ties of kinship, community, and affinity. Their main businesses include the processing of peanut oil, small-scale commerce, and the raising of livestock. The group is part of the Banc Villageois of KEUR NDIAGNA SAOUDA.

Ms. NIAMA S. (standing at the far right in the photo and wrapped in a white scarf) is the group’s leader. She is 48 years old, married, and the mother of two children. Those who are near and dear to her have entrusted her with four children to support.

She has a refrigerator, which enables her to make natural fruit juices, ice cream, ice, etc. She also sells soap and a few vegetables. She has been in this business for over four years. 

Her current loan will enable her to improve her small-scale business and to advance it. Her goal is to bolster her savings in the Banc Villageois with the goal of expanding her commerce.

loans.use: Developing and advancing her small-scale business

loans.name: Sukiasyan

texts.en: A. has been managing a clothing business since 2005.  He trades clothes with other countries and has limited access, so he needs a loan to cover the cost of some spring shirts, trousers and jeans for the upcoming high season. He also works as an engineer, and he supports his two retired parents with his business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing to sell

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana tiene 25 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario entre abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas y otros. El negocio cuenta con una antigüedad dos años y actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella ha podido ayudar a su esposo a mantener a su familia y sacarla adelante durante todo este tiempo.

Roxana desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.  Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Roxana, 25, is married and lives with her family in Olmos district, a commercially active agricultural zone located in Lambayeque province over an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She has a small home based store.  She sells her neighbors various daily use items like groceries, soft drinks and others.  She’s been in business for two years and currently has a regular, established customer base.  Thanks to this activity she’s been able to help her husband support the family all this time.

Roxana wants to expand the business buying more merchandise in order to meet customer demand.  She has, therefore, deemed it convenient to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes tiene 35  años, vive con sus 2 hijos en casa de sus familiares. Hace más de 2 años se dedica a la confección de mandiles y también bordados, desde entonces y teniendo como una herramienta su maquina de coser ella dispone de su tiempo para realizar esta actividad, además que le permite estar en su casa cuidando de sus hijos. Trabaja todos los días para luego los fines de semana vender al por mayor y de esta manera logra tener los ingresos  que le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar, le agrada realizar su trabajo porque le permite desarrollar su creatividad y lo considera un pasatiempo, esto la motiva para que cada día siga adelante es por eso que piensa tener una maquina de coser industrial. Es su  primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de telas e hilos al por mayor.
texts.en:
Lourdes, 35, lives with her two children in family members’ house.  For over two years she has been making aprons and embroidery.  Since then she’s had a sewing machine that’s her work tool.  She is able to manage her own time for work that she’s able to do at home while caring for her children.  She works every day in order to sell her wares at wholesale on weekends. This is how she earns income to meet household expenses.

She enjoys the work because it allows her to develop her creativity and she considers it like a hobby.  This motivates her to continue forward every day and this is why she’s thinking about getting an industrial sewing machine.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support and is grateful to all those who will fund the loan she’s asking for that will be so useful for the progress of her business.

She will use the requested funds to buy fabric and thread at wholesale.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread at wholesale.

loans.name: Maritza Alejandra

texts.es:
Maritza Mejía de 34 años, es madre soltera. Trabaja hace 3 años atras en el mercado municipal con un puesto de comercio de pescado y marisco. Labora de lunes a domingos de 7 hasta las 3 de la tarde. Tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad y labora con ella en el trabajo. 
 
Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso ahora quiere con el préstamo  va a comprar pescado, concha y camarón. Unos de sueños es poder comprar un terreno para hacer su casa ya que alquila.
texts.en:
Maritza Mejía, 34, is a single mother.  For the last three years she's been working in the back of the Municipal Market in a stand selling fish and sea food.  She works from Monday to Sunday, 7am to 3pm.  She has two adult children who work with her in the business.

She has many dreams for her business and wants to use the loan to buy fish, conch and shrimp.  One of her dreams is to buy a lot to build a house because she currently rents.

loans.use: For fish, conch and shrimp.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Increase the variety of goods in the store

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Luz, tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de 28, 27, 20 y 19 años, todos viven en su casa y la última está  estudiando en Universidad. 

Ella tiene una tienda de viveras de consumo en su casa, vende productos como  arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, etc. en ella trabaja todos los días desde las 6am hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan en su trabajo, los productos los compra en el centro de Tosagua aunque la mayoría de sus productos los recibe en su local, nos cuenta que lleva dos años con su negocio y que lo empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace tres ciclos  y le gusta porque ha hecho muchas amigas en el grupo. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The “La Inmaculada” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua, a place known for being very dynamic most of whose residents raise animals and are farmers because it’s an area with much vegetation.

We met Luz in this place.  She’s 44 years old and a single mother of four children who are 28, 27, 20 and 19 years of age.  They all live together in their house and the youngest is going to the university.

She has a home-based grocery store.  She sells products like rice, sugar, oil, detergents, etc.  She is open every day from 6am until 8pm and sometimes even later.  Her children help her with the work.  She buys her stock items in downtown Tosagua although most of her merchandise is delivered to the store.  She tells us that she’s been in business two years and that she started it with the first loan she got from the bank.

This loan will be used to better stock the store.  She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats and other basic need products.  

She’s been in the communal bank for three cycles and she likes it because she’s made many friends in the group.  Her goals are to stay in business and that her store grows more every day.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats and other basic need items.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su familia  en el sector Santa María, una zona urbano marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo, una ciudad bastante conocida a nivel nacional por su potencial turístico y comercial.

Ella cuenta con un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para niños y adultos. El negocio tiene una antigüedad de un año. Las prendas que vende son para todo público y actualmente cuenta con una clientela fidelizada. Los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad le sirven para solventar sus gastos personales y de su familia.

Alicia desea surtir en inventario de su negocio debido al cambio de temporada. Por ese motivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de  1000 nuevos soles con los cuales comprará diversas prendas como jeans, blusas, conjuntos para niños, entre otros, atendiendo a las solicitudes de sus clientes ya que existe una alta demanda por productos debido a que es conocida por dicha actividad en la zona.
texts.en:
Alicia, 28, is single living with her family in the Santa María sector, a marginal urban zone of the city of Chiclayo, a city that is quite well known nationally for its touristic and commercial potential.

She has had a small business for a year selling children’s and adult’s clothes .  The items she sells are for all the public and she currently has an established customer base.  Income from this activity makes it possible for her to meet her personal and family expenses.

Alicia wants to stock the business according to the change in season.  Because of this she thought it convenient to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy assorted articles of clothing like: jeans, blouses, and children’s outfits, among others thereby meeting her customer requests since there is high demand because she’s so well known for this activity in the area.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchasing goods to increase sales

loans.name: Lilik

texts.en:
Lilik is a teacher and lives with her husband, who is a doctor, two sons, who are both economists, and their wives and children. Altogether, there are 8 people living in her home. 

Lilik has been running a shoe business in a busy market since 1999.  She has high demand for new shoes, so she decided to purchase more from local shoemakers and also from China.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell

loans.name: Edgar Juvenal

texts.es:
Edgar C. de 27 años, está casado y tiene una hija 2 años. Trabaja  en servicio de transporte de personas en una moto. Anteriormente laboraba en una fábrica  de atún y quiso independizarse para tener sus propios ingresos. 

En la actualidad labora de lunes a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la  noche. Unas de sus dificultades es en época invernal las calles se destruyen por lo que hace un poco defectuosa la transportación de personas en el sector. 
 
Su esposa realiza el comercio de la pesca ya que la familia de ella son comerciantes de pesca en la parroquia. Con el préstamo va a hacer arreglar su tricimoto. Sus metas es poder mejorar su vivienda y brindarle la mejor educación a su hija
texts.en:
Edgar C. is 27 years old, married, and has a 2 year-old daughter.  He works providing a passenger transport service with his motorbike.  He used to work in a tuna factory but wanted to work for himself and make his own income.

Edgar currently works from Monday to Sunday, from 8.00am to 7.00pm.  One of the difficulties he has during the winter is that the streets get damaged which negatively affects the transportation of passengers in the area. 

Edgar's wife sells fish since her family are fish sellers in the area.  Edgar will use his loan to fix his 'tricimoto' (a motorbike with a cabin in the back for transporting passengers).  His goals are to improve his home and to provide his daughter with the best education possible.

loans.use: To fix his motorbike

loans.name: Navilles Caribe

texts.es:
Navilles R.  de 31 años, empezó este negocio de arroz, colas y legumbres ya que sus padres tenían una despensa, así que su sueño era tener una igual a la de sus padres. Empezó con muy  poco inventario, y desde que hizo crédito en D-miro ha incrementado su negocio. Elabora desde las 7:00am hasta las 22:30pm. Ella atiende siempre su tienda, pero en caso de tener que salir los hijos le ayudan, ya que su esposo trabaja.

No tiene ninguna  dificultad pero siempre tiene cuidado ya que en todos lados hay delincuencia. Su encuentra en unión libre. El conyugue Villamar Peñafiel Erwin  Ivan  Labora como oficial albañil desde hace 11 años y tiene 4 hijos (12, 3, 5, 4 años) estudiando escuelas fiscales.

Con el préstamo va a comprar víveres como aroz, ebidas, enlatados. Aspira en un futuro tener una despensa grande y con muchos clientes. Tener su cosa propia con cuarto para todos sus hijos.
texts.en:
Navilles Rodríguez, 31, started this rice, soft drink and vegetable business because her parents had a grocery store and her dream was to have one just like her parents.  She started out with just a little bit of inventory and when she got a loan from D-miro her business started growing.  She works from 7am until 10:30pm.  She always tends to the store herself but if she has to go out occasionally her children help out because her husband is employed. She does not have any difficulties but she’s always very careful because there is lawlessness everywhere. 

She is in a common law relationship with her spouse, Erwin Ivan Villamar Peñafiel, who has worked as a bricklayer for the last 11 years.  They have four children who are 12, 3, 4, and 5 years of age and going to public school.

She will use the loan to buy foodstuffs like rice, beverages and canned goods.  She hopes to have a large store with lots of customers in the future as well as a large house of her own with a bedroom for each one of her children.

loans.use: For rice, beverages and canned goods.

loans.name: Birma Pilar

texts.es:
Birma S. de 52 años, toda su vida se ha dedicado a la venta de encebollado(se prepara con yuca y pescado, plato tipico del Ecaudor) y también vende caldo se salchicha. 

Trabaja todos los días y tiene mucha clientela. No tiene dificultades en vender su comida. Esta casada, su esposo tiene una camioneta donde hace fletes y le ayuda en su mucho en su trabajo. Birma tiene 3 hijos pero ya están casados 
Con el préstamo va a comprar pescado yuca colas para realizar mas platos de encebollados.
texts.en:
Birma S. is 52 years old and has worked all of her life selling encebollado (a traditional dish from Ecuador made with yucca and fish) and sausage soup.

She works every day and has a large clientele, so it isn’t hard for her to sell her food. She is married and her husband has a truck which he uses for transport. She helps him a lot with his work. Birma has three children but they are already married.

With the loan, she will buy fish, yucca and sodas to make more encebollado dishes.

loans.use: Fish, vegetables

loans.name: Angel Ramón

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar encontramos a don Ángel, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un  hijo de  cinco años el  mismo que este año empieza a estudiar en escuela. La mujer  es comerciante.

El se dedica al trabajo en una piladora de maní en tosagua pero en su casa tiene una tienda de viveras de consumo, en la cual venden todo tipo de productos  como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, en ella trabaja su esposa todos los días y el cuándo esta en su casa desde las 6am hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, los productos los compra en el centro de Tosagua y algunos los recibe en su local.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 4 ciclos y le gusta todo del Banco. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca más.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua, every 15 days, La Inmaculada (the Immaculate) Community Bank meets. This place is known as being very dynamic, where the majority of its inhabitants are farmers or raise animals because this area has so much vegetation.

Here we find Angel. He is 30 years old and married with a son who is five years old. The boy will start school this year. Angel's wife is a salesperson.

Angel works for a peanut sheller in Tosagua, but the has a grocery store out of his home, where he sells all sorts of items such as rice, sugar, oil, and detergent. His wife works in the store every day, and he works there when he is home, from 6 am to 8 pm, and sometimes later. He buys the merchandise in Tosagua, but some things are delivered to his house.

This loan will be used to stock the store more. He is going to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic items. He has been with the community bank for four loan cycles and he is completely pleased with the bank. His goals are to move forward in his business and for his store to grow more.

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Fabrics, zippers, buttons

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a computer

loans.name: Fidel

texts.en:
Fidel and Rosario P. started Pac Jim Party Rentals in 2007 as a weekend business.  Pac Jim provides jumping balloons (moonwalks), tables, and chairs for outdoor functions.  The jumping balloons are large inflatables that children can play inside, and they are often used at social gatherings.  Fidel personalizes the jumping balloons by attaching an additional inflatable figure in the likeness of a superhero, movie or television character to the top of the main jumping balloon.

A former U.S. Marine, Fidel works full-time with a trucking company in border-crossing operations.  Fidel started Pac Jim so that his teenage children could earn spending money without working during the week.  It has grown faster than they ever thought it would and it has the added bonus of allowing them to spend time together as a family.  Fidel says they stay busy every weekend from mid-February to November.  

Fidel found ACCION Texas-Louisiana’s website through an internet search he conducted after being denied financing by a commercial bank.  Fidel is using this loan to buy 6, 10’x30’ party canopies.  He and Rosario have decided to add canopies to their inventory after receiving multiple requests from customers.  In fact, they are Pac Jim’s most requested item after the jumping balloons.  They previously bought canopies at a superstore locally, but the canopies were not commercial quality and quickly broke.  Fidel will also buy new balloon prints representing characters from this year’s blockbuster movies.  

While the inflatable industry is relatively new to El Paso, Fidel says it is very competitive.  Competition is such that he must take reservations without deposits, allowing clients to wait until the last minute to cancel without penalty.  Pac Jim Party Rentals is fully licensed with the Texas Bureau of Insurance, which is good, given the active environment the balloons encourage.  Fidel claims to be one of only two inflatable rental businesses in the area that are covered by insurance, and he points out that should someone be injured, the insurance provides the injured party recourse for their injury.

Fidel wants to someday grow his business volume to the point that he can add a team of 3-4 employees.  This would allow them to handle working more sites per weekend.

Check out their website at http://www.pacjim.com/.

loans.use: Canopies, balloon prints

loans.name: Bertha María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lindo lugar encontramos a Bertha, ella es una  jovencita muy luchadora y trabajadora, tiene 25 años de edad, está soltera y vive en casa de los padres junto con otro hermano menor, ella está estudiando en cuarto año de colegio y sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y obtener un título universitario que le permita ganarse la vida.
 
Ella tiene un puesto en el mercado de Tosagua en el cual vende frutas y verduras, trabaja todos los días desde las  06h00 hasta las 19h00, ella se desplaza desde la madrugada hasta el mercado mayorista de Tosagua a comprar los mejores productos para poder ofrecerles el mejor producto a sus clientes, nos cuenta que lleva con su negocio ya por ocho años y que gracias a esto ha podido seguir con sus estudios ya que este trabajo a ella le permite estudiar y ganarse la vida honradamente.

Este crédito es para comprar más frutas y legumbres y así seguir para adelante. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 años y le gusta porque le han ayudado mucho.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua, every 15 days, La Inmaculada (the Immaculate) Community Bank meets. This place is known as being very dynamic, where the majority of its inhabitants are farmers or raise animals because this area has so much vegetation.

In this beautiful place we meet Bertha. She is a young woman who is a fighter and a hard worker. She is 25 years old, single, and she lives in her parents' house with her younger brother. She is in her fourth year of college and her dream is to finish her studies and get a degree that will allow her to make a living.

She has a booth in the Tosagua market where she sells fruits and vegetables. She works every day from 6 am to 7 pm. She gets up at dawn to go to the wholesale market in Tosagua to purchase the best products so she can offer the best to her customers. She tells us she has had this business for eight years and thanks to this has been able to continue with her studies since this work allows her to go to school and make a living honorably.

This loan is to purchase more fruits and vegetables and continue moving forward. She has been in the community bank for five years, and she likes it because they have helped her so much.

loans.use: Purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Benno Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité BENNO est créé depuis 2008. Il a 6 cycles d'existence. Il est composé de 16 femmes qui sont toutes du même quartier. On remarque dans le groupe une bonne solidarité et une bonne cohésion de groupe. Elle s'activent toutes dans des activités génératrices de revenus. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de ARTILLERIE-NOB-SA-JËKËR

Madame FATOU S. (debout tout à fait à droite de la photo en écharpe bleue) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge de sa nièce.

Elle développe une activité de petit commerce : elle vend des chaussures, des vêtements et de l'huile d'arachide.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de renforcer son activité en augmentant son niveau d'approvisionnement afin de mieux accroitre sa production

Son objectif est de participer à la prise en charge de la nourriture et de soutenir son mari dans les différentes charges familiales
texts.en:
The Benno solidarity group was set up in 2008 and has been through six loan cycles. It is made up of 16 ladies who are all from the same neighborhood. There is a noticeably good solidarity and cohesion within the group. The ladies all have income-generating activities and the group is part of the Banc Villageois in Artillerie-Nob-Sa-Jëkër.

Mrs. Fatou S. (standing on the far right of the photo and wearing a blue scarf) is in charge of the group. She is 43 years old, married and mother to four children. She is also responsible for her niece.

She is building up a small business, selling shoes, clothes and peanut oil. Her new loan will allow her to strengthen her business by increasing her stock in order to grow her production. Her aim is to contribute to food costs and help her husband out with the various family expenses.

loans.use: Purchase of shoes, clothes and peanuts (to make into peanut oil)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase electronic goods to enrich the store's goods variety

loans.name: Nob Sa Jëkër Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité NOB SA JËKËR est créé le 05 décembre 2007. Il est composé de 14 femmes qui sont issues du même quartier. Elles font toutes du petit commerce, elles vendent soit des poissons frais, des légumes, des vêtements, des bijoux etc. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de ARTILLERIE NDIABOT

Madame NDATTE D. (debout à droite de la photo, vêtue de noir) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants en charge. 

Elle fait du petit commerce en vendant du poisson frais au marché central de son quartier. Elle s'approvisionne sur place auprès des pêcheurs qui viennent d'autres villages. Elle pratique cette activité depuis environs 05 ans.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de mieux développer son activité et escompter des bénéfices plus important qu'avant

Son objectif est d'augmenter son niveau d'épargne et de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
The Nob Sa Jëkër group was created on 5th December 2007. It is made up of 14 ladies who come from the same neighborhood. They all have small businesses, selling either fresh fish, vegetables, clothes or jewelry etc. The group belongs to the Banc Villageois in Artillerie Ndiabot.

Mrs. Ndatte D. (who is standing on the right of the photo and dressed in black) is in charge of the group. She is 43 years old, married and mother to five children, who are in her care.

She has a small business selling fresh fish at the central market in her neighborhood. She gets her supplies locally from fishermen who come from other villages. She has been carrying out this business for around five years. 

Her new loan will allow her to build up her business and make more profit than beforehand. Her aim is to increase her savings and help her husband to look after the family.

loans.use: To build up a small fish business

loans.name: Anushavan

texts.en: Anushavan started this business in 1998.  He sells glass and makes tables for traders in the market. Now he wants to enlarge his business and to increase his sales, so he will buy some more equipment and raw materials for his business. Anushavan lives with seven people: himself, his wife, his retired parents, and his three school-aged children. Anushavan is also an engineer.

loans.use: equipment and materials for his business

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en:
Gevorg A. lives in Gyumri city, one of the oldest and most beautiful cities of Armenia, which was affected by the devastating and destroying earthquake in 1987. People of Gyumri have been largely affected by the earthquake and most are still struggling to survive.
 
Gevorg has a long experience in trading in unmounted construction materials. He buys the old, little, dilapidated temporary huts that were given to earthquake survival citizens as temporary housing after the earthquake. His customers are happy to sell those huts to him, following their move to a new apartment.

He is married with two small children. Additional income would greatly assist the family. He has applied for the loan to be able to increase his working capital.

loans.use: additional working capital

loans.name: Alba Colombia

texts.es:
